GSP31yuktdipu:20: pārārthyañca tathānaikyaṃ viyogo yoga eva ca // 10 //
GSP31yuktdipu:45: itarathā hi alakṣaṇopetasyāpi sūtrasya tantrāṅgabhāvaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:55: tayorupayogi dṛṣṭāntaṃ sādhyasiddhaye samarthamiti kṛtvā mūlaśakalādayo 'trāntaranabhihitā apyetasmādavasīyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:56: athavā bhikṣorupasaṃhṛtabahiṣkaraṇāntaḥkaraṇasya teṣu teṣvatīndriyeṣu api pradhānādiṣvartheṣu buddhiṃ sūcayatīti sūtram /
GSP31yuktdipu:73: na hi tathā pratyakṣādīni pramāṇānyupadiṣṭāni tathā avayavā upadiṣṭāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:76: yadyapi sūtrakāreṇāvayavopadeśo na kṛtastathāpi bhāṣyakārāḥ kecideṣāṃ saṃgrahaṃ cakruḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:85: kintarhyanupadiṣṭamapyeṣāmastitvaṃ liṅgāt pratipadyāmahe yadayamācāryo duḥkhatrayābhighātājjijñāsā tadapaghātake hetāviti (ISk 1)
GSP31yuktdipu:97: tena vayaṃ liṅgātpratipadyāmahe santi jijñāsādayo 'vayavāḥ śāstra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:100: śāstre teṣāmanupadeśe prayojanaṃ vaktavyam- amuṣmāddhetorācāryeṇa nopadiśyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:108: pramāṇaṃ ca naste ācāryā ityataścānupadeśo jijñāsādīnāmiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:114: yo yatrābhiyuktaḥ karmaṇi cāduṣṭassa tatrāptastasyopadeśa āptavacanamiti teṣāmapyanupadeśaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:115: atha sati tantrāntaropadeśe pramāṇānyupadiśyante nāvayavā iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:119: yattūktaṃ pramāṇānupadeśaprasaṅga iti atra brūmaḥ- ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:122: upadeśameva tu sadoṣa iti kṛtvā kaḥ pratyācakṣīta ?
GSP31yuktdipu:125: tadyathā, takṣṇuhi caitra ityukte yāvadbhissādhanaviśeṣairvinā takṣaṇaṃ nopapadyate sarvāstāṃścaitra upādatte /
GSP31yuktdipu:126: tathā pratyakṣādiṣu pramāṇeṣūpadiṣṭeṣu yaireṣāmavinābhāvaḥ sarvāṇi tānyupādāsyāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:134: paśyati tvācāryo nādṛṣṭāntaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyamāpnotīti kṛtvā pratipādakāḥ pratipādanakāle tantrāntaropadiṣṭānapi mūlaśakalādīnākṣepsyanti iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:138: ākhyātasya hi pratyāmnāye bhūtavācinā śabdenopadeśo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:144: tantrāntaropadiṣṭo 'pi karmayonīnām prāṇabhedādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇopadeśassaṃgṛhīto bhavatīti siddhaṃ tantrāntaropadeśādavayavānupadeśaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:166: tadyathā mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ cetyukte (ISk 8)
GSP31yuktdipu:167: saṃśayo bhavati kena dharmeṇa kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ kena vā sarūpamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:173: arthatastat yathā tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:200: prayatnato bhagavataḥ paramarṣerārṣeṇa jñānena sarvatattvānāṃ svarūpamupalabhya saṃjñāṃ vidadhato nāsti svarūpanibandhanaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:222: ityevamanyā api tantrayuktayaḥ śakyā iha pradarśayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:226: yadi khalvapīdamapi prakaraṇaṃ syāt tantrāntare pātañjalapañcādhikaraṇavārṣagaṇaprabhṛtīnāmanyatamasya śeṣabhūtaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:238: āha, kiṃguṇaviśiṣṭāya śiṣyāya punaridaṃ tantraṃ vyākhyeyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:239: ucyate- jijñāsave matimate mīmāṃsakāyārthine 'bhyupagatāya śiṣyāya vyākhyeyaṃ śāstram /
GSP31yuktdipu:247: kathaṃ nāma śiṣyasya niḥśreyasena yogaḥ syādityevamarthamidaṃ vyākhyānaṃ kriyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:248: āha, yaduktaṃ jijñāsave vyākhyānaṃ kartavyamiti tatra kutaḥ punariyaṃ jijñāsā kasmin vārthe bhavatīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:249: ucyate - yattāvaduktaṃ kutaḥ punariyaṃ jijñāsā bhavatītyatra brūmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:255: prādhānyācca vyatiriktabuddhyā gṛhyamāṇaṃ sambandhitvādādhārasya bhedanibandhanāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā nimittattvaṃ pratipadyate- duḥkhānāṃ trayaṃ duḥkhatrayam /
GSP31yuktdipu:266: kartari yau tṛjakau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:272: kadācidguṇinā guṇo viśiṣyata iti cūrṇikārasya prayogaḥ tasmadanavadyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:277: maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:285: tathā hi padārthavyatirekeṇa viśiṣṭa eva vākyārthaḥ pratīyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:295: yadā tu devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklāmityucyate tadā devadattena gośabdena karmāntarebhyo vicchidya svātmanyavasthāpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:296: kriyā ca gośabdaśca sarvakartṛbhyo devadattakarmatayā vyavasthāpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:298: śuklaśabdo gośabdaśca gośabdaṃ sarvaguṇaviṣayamādheyāntarebhyo vyavacchedya svātmana ādhāratve niyamya,
GSP31yuktdipu:300: kevalānāntu padānāṃ sāmānyārthāt pracyutānāmviśeṣānabhidhānādānarthakyam / āha ca-
GSP31yuktdipu:305: evaṃ sati kuto 'yaṃ niścayapratilambho yadduḥkhaśabdo 'yamamaṅgalārtho yāvatā sandihyata eva ayaṃ kiṃ svārthapratipattyarthamupātto 'tha heyatvāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:318: yadyapi ekaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathāpi nimittānāmadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivalakṣaṇānāṃ bhedādasya bhedopacāraḥ kariṣyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:334: tadyathā catvāro varṇā ityasyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ sati paippalādādibhede teṣāṃ brāhmaṇatvādivyatirekābhāvānna saṃkhyāntarahetutvaṃ no khalvapi varṇāvyatirekādekatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:335: evaṃ trīṇi duḥkhānītyasyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ sati śarīrādibhede teṣāmādhyātmikādivyatirekāsambhavānna saṅkhyāntarahetutvaṃ no khalvapi duḥkhāvyatirekādekatvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP31yuktdipu:336: kiñcānyat, nimittabhedād bhedopacāra iti bhavāneva pratipannaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:340: yathāsurerduḥkhatrayābhighātājjijñāsā bhavatītyetadiṣṭaṃ tena sarveṣāmabhighāto 'stīti sarveṣāṃ jijñāsāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:341: atha mataṃ duḥkhābhighāte kasyacijjijñāsā bhavati kasyacinneti /
GSP31yuktdipu:344: prāgapyāsurerjijñāsāyā duḥkhatrayābhighāto na cāsyātyantike hetau jijñāsā babhūva /
GSP31yuktdipu:360: parikalpyamānā khalvapīyaṃ jijñāsā puruṣasya vā syādguṇānāṃ vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:365: na hyacetanā ghaṭādayo hitāhitaprāptiparihāraṃ jijñāsamānā dṛśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:370: na ca guṇapuruṣavyatiriktaṃ vastutastattvāntaramasti yasya jijñāsā parikalpyamānā parikalpyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:380: athāpi syādyeyamasati viśeṣe sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmāsurereva bhagavato duḥkhatrayābhighātabuddhirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:382: na hyantareṇa nimittamasau viśeṣo 'vasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:385: kuto jijñāsā bhavatītyevaṃ codakena pūrvamakāri praśnastasyāśca sākṣāt kāraṇamabhighātaḥ kāraṇāntarāṇāmanabhidhānādityasyaiva nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:387: atha nirbandhaḥ kriyate tena pūravadharmānugrahasya kuśalamūlābhyāsaparipākasya kāraṇakāraṇatvamasmābhirna pratiṣidhyata iti tadeva kiṃ na gṛhyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:394: na tu tadvyatiriktāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātavaḥ kvacidapi siddhāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:395: caturdaśavidhe ca saṃsāre yā sukhamātrā sā duḥkhabhūyastvāttacchabdavācyā bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:397: atra janmajarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:410: tasmātpratiṣedhya evāyaṃ pakṣa iti na kiñcidabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:415: yo 'yamācāryeṇa tacchabdaḥ sūtre paṭhito 'sya khalu pratipadamasambandhāt svalpāmapyarthavattāṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:417: ucyate- kathaṃ hi nāma prayoktṛpāratantryācchabdasya śabdāntareṇa sambandho na syāditi ?
GSP31yuktdipu:418: āha, na brūmo 'vidyamānasambandho 'sambandhaḥ kintarhyayuktasambandho yaḥ sa khalvasambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:419: tadyathā anācāro māṇavaka iti dravyeṇa kriyāśaktitvānna śakyaṃ kiñcidanācāravatā kṣaṇamapyavasthātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:421: tathā cāsya tacchabdasya pratipadaṃ sambandho na yuktastasmādanarthakastacchabdaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:423: anantarasya vidhirvā bhavati pratiṣedho vetyanayā yuktyā jijñāsāśabdasya tacchabdenābhisambandhaḥ śakya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:426: na hi jijñāsāpaghāte kiñcit prayojanamastīti satyapi sambandhe na tacchabdenārthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:435: itarathā jvaranimittako dāha iva śītadravyasaṃsparśātpraśānto 'pi nimittāvasthānātpunaḥ punaḥ pravartate ityaphalatvamasya vyāyāmasya /
GSP31yuktdipu:451: na caikasminkāle śabdasya pradhānatvamupasarjanatvaṃ ca yuktitaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:465: na tu vayaṃ guṇalakṣaṇasya duḥkhasyāpaghātaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:472: aviśeṣātkalpayitvāpi vṛttyapaghātaṃ vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvād vṛttyapaghāte vṛttimadapaghātaḥ prāpta iti nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:477: yadi tarhi tacchabdasya duḥkhaśabdenaivābhisambandho 'bhyupagamyate tena ye 'smābhiḥ pūrvamabhihitā doṣāste prasajyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:485: ucyatāntarhi kintat pratividhānaṃ yasyāvaṣṭambhenānekadoṣavyāhato 'pyayaṃ pakṣa āśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:488: yattāvaduktamanekapadavyavadhānānna duḥkhaśabdasya tacchabdenābhisambandha ityatra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:490: yo hyanantarakṛtaṃ śabdasya śabdāntareṇa saha sambandhamācaṣṭe tampratyayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:496: śāstre ca vyavahitānāmapi sarvanāmnāmabhisambandho dṛśyate “yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāddravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne tvatalā“vityatrārthakṛtaśca sambandhaḥ śabdānāmabhyupagataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:501: tathā “anaḍvāhamudahāriṇi bhagini vahasi yā tvaṃ śirasi kumbhamavācīnamabhidhāvantamadrākṣīriti” vārtike dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:502: na hyatra satyānantarye śirasānaḍuho vahanaṃ kumbhasya vā saraṇamupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:507: na tu vayaṃ samāsavṛttereva tacchabdenābhisambandha iti pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:508: kintarhi samāsādapoddhṛtasya buddhivyavasthitasyopajanitasvātantryasya śabdāntareṇa sambandhamicchāma iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:509: athaitadaniṣṭam “yogapramāṇe ca tadabhāve darśanaṃ syāt” “atha śabdānuśāsanaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:510: keṣāṃ śabdānām” iti caivamādīnāmprayogāṇāṃ virodhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:517: kintarhi puruṣārthanibandhanā caritārtha śaktirasya puruṣārthapravṛttau prayojanāsadbhāvādātmakalpena vyavatiṣṭhata ityetadvivakṣitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:533: ekāntaśca atyantaṃ ca te ekāntātyante tayorabhāva ekāntātyantato 'bhāvaḥ tasmāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:535: ṣaṣṭhyā eva vā tasiḥ ṣaṣṭhyā vyāśraya iti yogavibhāgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:538: tathā hi, stryādīnāṃ satyetasmin doṣadvaye 'śakyamarjjanaṃ kartumasvābhāvikatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:546: yadāyurvedavihitasya kriyākramasyābhiyuktamātmavantaṃ bheṣajabhiṣakparicārakasampannaṃ pratyānarthakyam / āha ca -
GSP31yuktdipu:556: mahatā khalvapi prayatnena nivartitā vyādhayaḥ punarutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:563: yadi hi stryādayo viṣayāḥ sarvadā duḥkhapratīkārasamarthā bhaveyuḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:564: kimati teṣu sannihiteṣu viṣayiṇo viṣayāntarajighṛkṣā syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:568: yadi hi viṣayopabhogo 'tyantameva mānasaṃ duḥkhamapahanyāt kiṃ prāptaṃ yena bhūyastaṃ prati viṣayiṇo 'bhilāṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:570: yasmānna hyavidyamāne tamasi devadattasya pradīpaṃ pratyapekṣā bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:571: dṛśyate ca nivṛttecchānāmapi viṣayopabhogādviṣayiṇāṃ bhūyo viṣayābhilāṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:573: kintarhi sutarāṃ vṛddhiṃ karoti / āha ca -
GSP31yuktdipu:582: viṣayiṇā pradīyamāno vārthibhyaḥ parimitatvādavacchidyetetyanupāyo 'yaṃ duḥkhāpaghāte buddhimatām /
GSP31yuktdipu:587: nābhijātiṃ na vijñānaṃ na ca śauryamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:602: gato vaneṣu ramate sa sukhāni samaśnute //
GSP31yuktdipu:605: na hi supratiniviṣṭasyāpi kāminaḥ sarvatra viṣayasannidhānena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:609: viyoge ca sati dhruvo 'niṣṭānubandha iti ko 'rtho viṣayaparigraheṇa ?
GSP31yuktdipu:610: tatra yaduktaṃ dṛṣṭasya hetoḥ sadbhāvādapārthakā jijñāseti etadayuktam // 1 // @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:614: āha- yadyekāntātyantato 'bhāvāddṛṣṭe hetāvaparitoṣastena tarhyastyayamanyo heturubhayadoṣavarjitaḥ sa kasmānna parigṛhyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:618: katham ? evaṃ hyāha - paśubandhena sarvāṃllokān jayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:622: syānmatam pratyakṣata evedaṃ vihitasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nopalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:623: tathā hi putrakāma iṣṭiṃ nirūpya duhitaramapi na prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:624: arthakāmaśca karma kṛtvā māṣakamapi na labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:633: yadi khalvapi karmaṇaḥ phalavattvaṃ neṣyate tena tannimittasya saṃsāsarasyābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:648: ucyate- mantrabrāhmaṇaṃ yāvadvā purātanamanuśrūyamāṇaṃ prāmāṇyenābhyupagamyate tatrabhavadbhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:652: āha, kiṃ pūrvasmādeva hetorayamānuśraviko heturanabhipreta iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:668: yadi śāstreṇa coditeyaṃ hiṃsā na syāt muktasaṃśayamaviśuddhitvamasyāḥ pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:674: tasmādadhīyatāṃ yadi kaścidastyubhayapakṣaprasiddho hetuḥ yato nissaṃśayaḥ pratyayaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:681: āptavacanatvaṃ prākprasādhyāsya vedasya paścāt ayamupālambho yuktamabhidhātuṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:685: kasmāt ? puruṣabuddhipūrvakatve sati rāgādiyogācchabdo vicārārhaḥ syāt kimāptavacanaṃ na veti /
GSP31yuktdipu:689: yadi caitasminnarthe bhavānapi paryanupayujyeta - kathamidaṃ niścīyate yaduta prāṇināmiṣṭaśarīravyāpādanādaviśuddhihiṃseti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:692: tasmāt ko 'tra hetuḥ anyatra pramāṇamihaivaitadapramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati hiṃsāto dharma iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:693: anugrahopaghātalakṣaṇatvādahiṃsāhiṃsayoḥ pratyakṣasiddhiriti cet - athāpi syāt ahiṃsātaścānugraho bhavatīṣṭaśarīravyāpādanalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:702: ubhayābhidhānācchāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti cet syānmatam tadeva śāstramahiṃsāmāha,
GSP31yuktdipu:707: sāmānye hi śāstramahiṃsāmutsṛjya viśeṣe kratulakṣaṇe 'pavādaṃ śāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:709: tadyathā - dadhi brāhmaṇebho dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:713: yathā khalvapi śāsre pratiṣiddhaṃ kanyāgamanamiti nedānīmabhirūpaḥ pratigṛhya,
GSP31yuktdipu:725: no khalvapi brūmaḥ śāstracoditāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ pravartamānasyāniṣṭaphalasambandho bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:726: kintarhi sati svargaprāptinimittatve vedavihitasya karmaṇaḥ samanuṣṭhānaṃ prāṇijamupaghātamantareṇa na sambhavati iti hitakāmairabhyupekṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:727: yasmāt na hyetaduktaṃ yadanyeṣāmupaghātenātmānugrahaḥ kārya iti / āha -
GSP31yuktdipu:732: yo 'sau hiṃsānimittakaḥ kāruṇyān manasi naḥ paritāpa utpadyate sā khalvaviśuddhirabhipretā /
GSP31yuktdipu:740: yadi cānuśravikasya praśasyatā nābhipretā syāt prakarṣapratyayānupapattiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:748: jarayā ha etasmāt satrādvimucyate, mṛtyunā ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:754: teṣāṃ cāsvābhāvikatvāt aśakyamarjanaṃ prayogataḥ pūrvaṃ kartumiti pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:757: yatra hetuśāstrayorvipratipattirbhavati tatra vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādanumānasya balīyaḥ śāstramityavaśayamabhyupagantavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:771: yadi punaḥ karmāṇi nityakartavyatayeṣyante tena sannyāsaśāstraṃ hīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:780: yathaiva karmaṇāṃ samanuṣṭhānaṃ śāsti śāstraṃ tathā sannyāsamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:782: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:783: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
GSP31yuktdipu:785: na karmaṇā mṛtyumṛṣayo niṣeddhuḥ prajāvanto draviṇamicchamāṇāḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:809: evaṃvidhāṃ hi stutimupaśrutya phalārthine hi yajamānāya vidhiḥ prarocate /

GSP31yuktdipu:870: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “tapaḥśraddhe ye hyupavasanti araṇye śāntā vidvāṃso bhaikṣacaryā carantaḥ sūryadvāreṇa te virajasaḥ prayānti yatrāmṛtaḥ sa puruṣo 'vyayātmā /

GSP31yuktdipu:912: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “atha ye ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattamityupāsate,
GSP31yuktdipu:918: ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilā māṣā iti jāyante /

GSP31yuktdipu:1054: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā /“

GSP31yuktdipu:1101: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijighatso vipipāso vijaro vimṛtyurviśokaḥ sannyastasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa jijñāsitavyaḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:1188: samāsāntaravidhānādadoṣa iti cetsyānmatam- yadyetasmin samāse doṣo 'yamupapadyate samāsāntaramatra vidhāsyate mūlaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ mūlaprakṛtiriti /

GSP31yuktdipu:1289: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣa iti vakṣyati /

GSP31yuktdipu:1320: tato 'haṅkāratamātrapūrvakatve siddhe sati indriyamahābhūtaparvaṇoḥ punaḥ śruterniyamo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1321: tadyathā pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā ityatra kṣutpratīkārasamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāmarthādeva sarveṣāṃ bhakṣaṇe samprāpte punaḥ śruterniyamo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1325: kathaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti yathā vijñāyate,

GSP31yuktdipu:1332: mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ saptetyapadiṣṭe kimiti sāṃśayikā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1334: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ syāt yadyapyetadarthataḥ siddhaṃ tathāpyayamācāryaḥ sphuṭapratipattyarthamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyādriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1338: rātsasyetyevamādiṣvantareṇa prayatnamiṣṭato 'vadhāraṇe siddhe anyatra ajādī guṇavacanādeva stautiṇyoreva ṣaṇyabhāsādityevamādiṣu yatnaṃ karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1342: sati vā punaravadhāraṇārthatve tuśabdasya kathamivātra śakyamavadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum ?

GSP31yuktdipu:1366: iha puruṣārthena hetunā sāmyātpracyutānāṃ guṇānāṃ yo 'yaṃ mahadādirviśeṣānto vipariṇāmaḥ sa tattvāntarotpattiniyamena vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1377: yathā pradhānātsūkṣmataramavasthāntaraṃ nāstīti tatra prakṛtibhāvasya pratyastamayastathā teṣu vikārabhāvapratyastamayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1394: yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:1403: yadi guṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāmārambhaḥ tadā teṣāmapyacetanatvaṃ syāt,

GSP31yuktdipu:1429: yathā vrīhyāti prameyaṃ prasthādinā pramāṇena paricchidyate evamihāpi vyaktādiprameyaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇena paricchidyate iti /

GSP31yuktdipu:1442: paramarṣerhi bhagavataḥ jñānaṃ sāṃsiddhikamapramāṇapūrvakamiti vaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1445: ubhayāvadhāraṇe sati ubhayorapi pakṣayorye doṣāste prasajyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1448: kadāciddyayaṃ pramātā sannihite 'pyādityādau liṅge diṅniścayādiṣvartheṣu pratihanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1450: ucyate- yaduktaṃ hiśabdāvacanamavadhāraṇānupapatteriti astu pramāṇebhya evetyavadhāraṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1453: sādhyamānarūpāṇi hi vastūni nāntarīyakatvāt svarūpaniṣpattaye sādhanasambandhaṃ pratyākāṃkṣāvanti bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1465: tatra yadā tamaḥ prakṛṣyate tadā tenābhibhūtatvāt sattvasya tatkāryamanumānaṃ trikālāṅgamuttiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1468: yasya tu niṣpattivaikalyātpramāṇapratibandho neṣṭaḥ tasya svarūpahānaṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1469: katham ? etāvaddhi teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ yaduta prameyaparicchedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1471: āha- bahūni pramāṇānyācāryairabhyupagamyante tāni sarvāṇi kiṃ bhavānanumanyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1476_0: anenaitadācaṣṭe- ekameva buddhilakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ nimittāntarānugrahopajanitābhiḥ kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnarūpabhedābhiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1477: na tu yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ viṣayopanipātibhirindriyairupajanitāvadhyo buddhayastatheha vidyante yāḥ parikalpyamānāḥ svatantrāṇi trīṇi pramāṇāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1478: syānmatam, kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmakavastusanniveśarūpabhedā bhavantīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1480: yathā sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāmekaśabdādivastusanniveśe 'pi prakāśādikāryabhedādrūpasaṃkaro na bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1482: yathā vā kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇasampradānāpādānakarmalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmekadravyasanniveśe 'pi kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnāni svarūpāṇi na saṃkīryante,
GSP31yuktdipu:1486: na hi kṣaṇabhaṅgasāhasaṃ yuktimantareṇa daṇḍabhayādapi pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:1487: na tu tasyāmavasara iti sthīyatāṃ tāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1488: āha, kathaṃ punaretad gamyate yathā trividhameva pramāṇaṃ na punaranekavidhamapīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1497: sarveṣāṃ paraparikalpitānāṃ pramāṇānāmasminneva trividhe pramāṇe 'ntarbhāvāditi yāvaduktaṃ syāttāvadidamucyate sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:1498: athavā sarvapramāṇeṣu siddhaṃ sarvapramāṇasiddhaṃ- saptamī siddhaśuṣkapakvabandhairiti samāsaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1504: anyāni punarasmāt trayāt yathābhinnāni tathā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1508: iti / tatra dṛṣṭaṃ nāma upāttaviṣayendriyavṛttyupanipātī yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1509: anumānaṃ dvayoravinābhāvinorekaṃ pratyakṣeṇa pramāya tatpūrvakaṃ sambandyantare yat paścānmānaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1512: mūlalakṣaṇaṃ tu ācāryo vakṣyati svayameva prativiṣayādhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:1530: avabodhavidhistu yenānupalabdho gavayaḥ sa tasyopalabdhyarthamadhigatagavayaṃ paryanuyuṅkte kiṃrūpo gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1531: sa tasmā ācaṣṭe- yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1532: tatra pratipattyātyantānupalakṣitagavayasvarūpo vyākhyātṛpratipāditaprasiddhavastusādharmyajñānāhitasaṃskāraḥ pratipadyate- nūnamevaṃrūpo gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1533_1: pratyakṣeṇa tamupalabhya yā samākhyāsambandhapratipattiḥ- ayamasāvartho 'sya śabdasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1536: yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti cāptopadeśabalāt pratipattā aprasiddhaṃ gavayamupalabhate na sādharmyamātrāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1538: yattu khalviti ha uvāca yājñavalkyasya ityetadaitihyaṃ nāma pramāṇāntaramupakalpyate tadapi vaktṛviśeṣāpekṣatvānna śabdādarthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:1540: yadi hyāptopadeśa upamā syāttena yathā svarge 'psarasaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1541: uttarāḥ kurava ityevamādiṣvantareṇa sādharmyopādānaṃ pratipattirbhavati evamihāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1542: gavayantu ayamākhyātā pratipādayiṣyan prasiddhasādharmyagarbhaṃ śabdamupādatte na kevalam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1545: śabdavyāpārāttadantarbhāva iti cet syānmatam śabdavyāpārasahito 'yaṃ prasiddhasādharmyalakṣaṇārtho gavayapratipattau na kevalaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1555: sa tu kauśalāddurupapādo 'yamartha iti kṛtvā prasiddhasādharmyamupādatte /
GSP31yuktdipu:1560: yatra hyarthavaśātpratipattirutpadyate na tatra pratipattā vaktṛviśeṣamapekṣate dṛṣṭārtho 'yamadṛṣṭārtho 'yamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1565: yo hi manyate prasiddhasādharmyādeva gavayapratipattiriti yathāśvastathā gavaya ityetasmādapi tasya sampratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1571: tadyathā bahuṣu niṣaṇṇeṣu ko 'tra devadatta ityukte yo mukuṭī kuṃḍalī vyūḍhoraskastāmrāyatākṣa iti pratyāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:1572: tataśca samākhyāsambandhapratipattiriti pramāṇāntaratvaprasaṅga ityevamanavasthā pramāṇānāṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1574: evaṃ hi na tāvat parata upamānaṃ pramāṇāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:1575: yadā svayameva gāṃ gavayaṃ copalabhya vikalpayati yathāyaṃ tathāyamiti tadā tasyārthasya pramāṇāntareṇādhigatatvāt pramāṇameva tanna bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1581: śravaṇādyathā guḍaśabdaṃ śrutvā mādhuryamaśabdakaṃ pratipadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1586: tatra vyabhicāriṇī yathā sāvayavamanityamityukte 'rthādāpannaṃ niravayavaṃ nityamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1588_0: yā tvavinābhāvinī avyabhicāriṇī yathā kesarivarāhayorupagahvare sannipātamupalabhyottarakālaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1588_1: kevalaṃ kesariṇaṃ varāhavraṇāṃkitaśarīraṃ prayāntamupalabhya pratipadyate jito varāha iti tadanumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1590: tatra yadā kesariṇo jayamupalabhyāvyabhicāriṇamitarasya parājayaṃ pratipadyate kimanyatsyādṛte 'numānāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1591: adhigatobhayasambandhisamudāyasya hi pratipattuḥ pratyakṣībhūtānyatarasambandhino yā sambandhyantarapratipattistadanumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1593: sambhavo nāma droṇaḥ prastha ityukte 'rdhadroṇādīnāṃ sannidhānamavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1597: tatra droṇa ityukte yadatyantasahabhuvāṃ tadavayavānāmanyaśabdavācyānāmapi sannidhānam tadarthāpattireva /
GSP31yuktdipu:1599: abhāvo nāma tadyathā dhūmasya bhāvādagnerbhāvaḥ pratīyate evaṃ dhūmābhāvādagnyabhāva ityayaṃ pratidvandvisāhacaryakalpanayārthāpattirabhihitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1600: tatra yadā vyabhicārasāhacaryakalpanā tadā pramāṇābhāva eva /
GSP31yuktdipu:1602: yatra tu kvacidekāntaḥ syāt yathākṛtakatvānnitya iti tatrānumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1606: tadyathā gehe nāsti caitra ityukte bahirastīti sampratyayo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1608_0: katham ? yathaiva hi divā na bhuṅkte devadattaḥ pīna ityatrābhojanapratiyogino meduratvasyopalambhāddivāpratiyogini
GSP31yuktdipu:1608_1: kāle rātrau bhujiravasīyate evamihāpi gehābhāvābhidhānasāmarthyāttatpratiyogini viparyayaḥ kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1609: anyathā tu yadyabhāva evābhipretaḥ syānnāsti caitra eveti brūyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1614: kasmāt ? yasmād bhojanecchādisahacaro hi vyāpāro 'nuṣṭhīyamāno yadi sahacāriṇaṃ gamayati tadā nānumānātpṛthagiti śakyaṃ pratijñātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:1617_0: āha, yo 'yamanādau saṃsāre devamanuṣyatiraścāmabhinne 'rthe bāhye stryādau pratyaye
GSP31yuktdipu:1621: yena hi yo 'rtho 'bhyastassukhāditvena tasya vināpi tenārthena śabdamātrāt pratipattirutpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1622: tadyathā vyāghro 'tra prativasatītyukte vināpi bāhyenārthenābhyāsavaśādeva svedavepathuprabhṛtayo bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1628: yadi pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhetyupagamyate tena tarhi asau pratyakṣamanumānamāptavacanaṃ cetyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1629: kasmāt ? yato na dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa pratyakṣarūpaṃ kadācidapyupalabhāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:1632: astyārṣo hi dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa sarvapadārtheṣu sāṃsiddhikaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1640: na hi yogināmapramāṇapūrvakaṃ jñānamiti yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1644: tadyathā santamase vrajato drāgiti vijñānamutpadyate - asti me pratīghāti dravyaṃ purastādūrdhvamavasthitamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1647: na hi tatra niścaya utpadyate idaṃ taddravyamasti purato vā vyaktamastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1650: yadi caivaṃjātīyato 'pi pratyayaḥ pramāṇamabhyupagamyate tenānavasthā prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1653: kāmakrodhalobhayaviṣādadvārako vikalpaḥ samyaṅmithyā vā yasmādaneka utpadyate tasmānna laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1657: sā tu mithyājñānatvātpramāṇatvena na parigṛhyate ityayamadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1658: tasmāt siddhaṃ dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa rūpāntaranupapatteḥ pratibhāyāḥ pṛthaganabhidhānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1690: upāttaviṣayāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttyupanipāti sattvodrekādarajastamaskaṃ yatprakāśarūpaṃ tad dṛṣṭamiti yāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1703: viṣayanirbhāsā hi jñānasyotpattiḥ adhigamarūpāpi loke savyāpāreva pratīteti kalpanayā karaṇabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate na paramārthataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1711: yathaiva hi ghaṭādayo 'rthā jñānamantareṇa na tadrūpā nātadrūpā iti na śakyaṃ pratipattum,
GSP31yuktdipu:1712: evaṃ jñānamapi puruṣapratyayamantareṇa na viṣayarūpaṃ nāviṣayarūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1713: tathā ca śāstram- “tatsaṃyogādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva liṅgamiti” (ISk 20) vacanāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1719: āha- yadi hyadhyavasāyaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ laukikaḥ prayogo 'rthavān bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vastu iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1721: yathā prasthapramito vrīhirāśiḥ prasthaśabdavācyo bhavati evaṃ pratyakṣapramito 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaśabdavācyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1723: yadi pratyakṣapramitatvādviṣaye pratyakṣaśabdastena tarhi anumāmapramito 'rtho 'numānamiti syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1727: yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamātītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1735: na cāgnyādibhiḥ kaścidanumīyata ityatastulyaśabdavācyatā na bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1738: prativiṣayaṃ dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne yāvatkiṃcit prativiṣayaṃ vartate 'nugrāhakatvenopaghātatvena vā tat sarvaṃ dṛṣṭamityetadāpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1739: adhyavasāyagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1743: na cādhyavasāyādṛte yatkiṃcidviṣayaṃ pratipadyate tena kiṃcit pramīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1745: tadyathā- adhyayanādhikāre brāhmaṇā ānīyantāmityukte ya evādhīyante ta evānīyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1747: evaṃ tarhi śrotrādīnāmanyatamamantaḥkaraṇaṃ cetyetad dvāradvāribhāvena catuṣṭayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1753: yadi punaḥ sarveṣāmeva pramāṇatvamabhyupagamyate tena yacchāstramekameva darśanaṃ khyātireva darśanamiti taddhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1760: sarvasandeheṣu caitadupatiṣṭhate- vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi saṃdehādalakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1766: āha- kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yena nimittāviśeṣe 'pi śrotrādivṛtterevātra grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1773: tadyathā- gauranubandhyaḥ ajo 'gnīṣomīya iti vāhīko nānubadhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1774: āha- yadīyaṃ śrotrādivṛttireva pratyakṣamityabhupeyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1776: yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamatītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1783: adhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne mṛgatṛṣṇikālātacakragandharvanagarādiṣu api yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1796: sāmānye hi viṣayamātre 'dhyavasāyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vidhāya viśeṣe liṅgaliṅgipūrvake 'numānaṃ śāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1798: yathā taddhi brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1817: ucyate- na tarhīdaṃ pratigrahaṇamindriyaviśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo vartate tasmin yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1818: kintarhi- adhyavasāyaviśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo 'dhyavasāya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1832: ucyate- astu tarhīndriyāṇāṃ prati viṣayagrahaṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1835: evaṃ tarhi prativiṣayādhyavasāyaśca prativiṣayādhyavasāyaśca prativiṣayādhyavasāya iti sarūpāṇāmekaśeṣaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1837: dvitīyenāntaraṅgasya prātibhasyeti rāgādiviṣayaṃ yogināṃ ca yadvijñānaṃ tat saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1845: yasya hi yat kāraṇaṃ sa loke tatpūrvaka ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1854: tatra pūrvavat yadā kāraṇamabhyuditaṃ bhaviṣayattvaṃ kāryasya pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1857: na hi meghodayo 'vaśyaṃ vṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1859: ucyate- yadi tarhi kāraṇaśaktiṃ sahakāriśaktyantarānugṛhītāmapratiyoginīṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryasya vyaktiṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1860: tadyathā yadā lauhadaṇḍādisādhanasampanne vyāpāravatā kumbhakāreṇādhiṣṭhitāṃ mṛdamupalabhya ghaṭasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:1862: śeṣavat- yadā kāryanirvṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇasadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1866: na hi dvayasamāpattipūrvaka eva prāṇabhṛtāṃ prādurbhāvo,
GSP31yuktdipu:1868: ucyate- yadā tarhi prabhānuraṃjitamantarikṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā candrārkayorudayaṃ pratipadyate tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1871: na hi prabhānurāgo 'ntarikṣe candrārkanimitta eva bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1873: ucyate - yadā tu nadīpūraṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṭiṃ pratipadyate tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1878: ucyate yadā tarhi parṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śālūkaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1879: aṃkuraṃ vā dṛṣṭvā bījamiti tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1884: tatra yadā prasaṃgināṃ himavilayanādīnāṃ deśakālaliṅgaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate tadā muktasaṃśayaṃ pratipattirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1892: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma yatraikadārthayoravyabhicāramupalabhya deśāntare kālāntare ca tajjātīyayoravyabhicāraṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1897: tadyathā kvacit sādhanavato mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭaniṣpattimupalabhyānyatra sādhanavataḥ piṇḍāntarādghaṭāntaraniṣpattiṃ pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1900: ucyate- yadā tarhi sahabhuvāmekasya viśiṣṭaguṇamupalabhya śeṣāṇāmapi tadvattvamanumīyate tadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1901: tadyathā vṛkṣādekasya phalasya pākamupalabhya śeṣāṇāṃ vṛkṣāntarāṇāṃ ca pāko 'numīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1904: na hi sarveṣāṃ phalānāṃ tulyakālaṃ pāko bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1907: ucyate- yadā tarhi samudrādekamudababinduṃ prāśya śeṣasya lavaṇatānumīate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1908: sthālyāṃ vaikaṃ pulākamupalabhya śeṣāṇāṃ pāko 'numīyate tadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1912: tatraivaṃ pramāṇe parikalpyamāne kāryakāraṇayostatsaṃghātānāṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamohasvabhāvopalambhāttanmātrāhaṅakārapradhānānāṃ samadhigamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1915: ucyate- yadā tarhi kvaciddharmeṇa dharmāntarasyāvyabhicāramupalabhyaikadharmopalambhādbhinnajātīye 'tyantānupalabdhasya dharmāntarasya pratipattistadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1921: atrāpi ca deśāntaraprāptilakṣaṇāt kāryād gatilakṣaṇasya kāraṇasyādhigamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1924: yatra hi niyamataḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇamadhigamyate taccheṣavaditi ayamasmadabhisandhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1948: dvitīyena manvādinibandhanānāṃ ca smṛtīnāṃ vedāṅgatarketihāsapurāṇānāṃ śiṣṭānāṃ nānāśilpābhiyuktānāṃ cāduṣṭamanasāṃ yadvacastatpramāṇamityetasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1951: evaṃ sati yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ śiṃśapādiśabdānāṃ nirvikalpamanumāne 'ntarbhāvastrilakṣaṇatvāditi tadayatnataḥ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavatīti vyākhyātāni pramāṇāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:1961: tatra yaduktametāvadbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sakalapadārthāvabodha iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1964: tatra satyameva pūrvavaccheṣavatī prāganubhūtasambandhaviṣayaphale iti kṛtvā na tābhyāmaśeṣapadārthādhigamo 'bhyupagamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1967: katham ? yathā hi kṛtakatvānityatvayorghaṭe sahabhāvamupalabhyānyatra śabdādau kṛtakatvadarśanādanityatvamanumīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1972: yeṣāṃ tu śeṣavadeva sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ tasya kāryadvāreṇa samadhigamahetutvāt puruṣasyāgrahaṇaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1974: yadyapi puruṣasya kāryābhāvastathāpi puruṣāvyaktamahadahaṅkāraviśeṣāṇāṃ sāmprate kāle svavṛttibhyasteṣāṃ grahaṇamityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1978: yadi vṛttyā grahaṇaṃ puruṣasya sūpapādamabhaviṣyat saṃhatapārārthyamācāryo hetutvena nāvakṣyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1986: svarūpaṃ hi sādhanasya dvividham- sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:1989: tatra yadā hetuḥ parapakṣamapekṣya yathārthena svarūpeṇa sādhyasiddhāvupadiśyate tadā vītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1990: yadā tu svasādhyādarthāntarabhūtānāṃ prasaṃgināṃ kṣepamapohaṃ kṛtvā pariśeṣataḥ sādhyasiddhāvapadiśyate tadāvītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1991: tadyathā na cet paramāṇupuruṣeśvarakarmadaivakālasvabhāvayadṛcchābhyo jagadutpattiḥ sambhavati pariśeṣataḥ pradhānāditi tadā punaravītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1992: tatra yadā vīto hetuḥ svabuddhāvavahitavijñānasarūpaṃ vijñānāntaramādadhānena vaktrā pratipādyādau vākyabhāvamupanīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2000: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti paryanuyuktaḥ pratyāha- anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2009_0: atha nāstīti niścīyate tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānāttadvadanye 'pi padārthā na santīti
GSP31yuktdipu:2013: sādhyasya yadavadhāraṇamasti puruṣa iti sā pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2023: yastu tasya sādhyasahabhāvitvalakṣaṇaḥ prapañcaḥ so 'vayavāntarāṇītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2025: tasya sādhanasya sādhyena sahabhāvitvanidarśanaṃ yadasau dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2034: yathā śayanādayaḥ saṃhatatvātparārthā evaṃ cakṣurādibhirapi parārthairbhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2038: tadyathā- tasmādasti puruṣa ityeṣāmavayavānāṃ parasparasambandhādviśiṣṭārthaḥ samudāyo vākyamityupadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2039: vākyamapyanekaṃ yadā guṇībhūtasvārthamarthāntaropakāritvāditareṇa saṃsṛjyate tadā śāstramapyekaṃ vākyamityavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2043: yathā hi svayamutpadyate niścetuḥ pratyayastathaivānyaḥ pratyāyya ityetannyāyyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2044: na ca svayamevārthaṃ pratipadyamānasya jijñāsādīnāṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2055: tadbhāve bhāvāditi cet syādetat satsu jijñāsādiṣu tattvādhigamaṃ prati pravṛttirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2065: yadi sādhyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñetyucyate tena sādhyasya hetordṛṣṭāntasya vā yadavadhāraṇaṃ tadapi pratijñā prāpnoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2071: yo hi sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ heturityetallakṣaṇamācaṣṭe tena prāksādhanamabhidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2072: tato vaktavyamamuṣya samāsavacanaṃ heturiti na caivamuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2075: yadi hi samāsagrahaṇaṃ kriyate kiṃ prāptaṃ yo 'yamādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ caikajātisamanvayo dṛṣṭa ityevamādiḥ sādhanaprapañcaḥ so 'heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2083: kasmāt ? tasya dvidhā bhinnasya pañcadhā sādhanabhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2086: tatrāpi vītaḥ pañcaprabhedaḥ ityataḥ samudāyānniṣkṛṣṭasyaikasya liṅgatvamaśakyaṃ vaktumiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2090: atra śabdo vā yena sādhyasādhane nidarśyete sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2093: na tadyadi tāvacchabdaḥ parigṛhyate tata upanayalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2094: kasmāt ? na hi yathābhidhānaṃ tathā sādhyamityekakriyā yujyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2099: ucyate- yaducyate svaniścayenāṅgabhāvagamanātparapratyāyanārthaṃ jijñāsādyanabhidhānamiti atra brūmaḥ- na, uktatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2101: sarvasya cānugrahaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaṃ śāstravyākhyānaṃ vipaścidbhiḥ pratāyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:2104: athaitadaniṣṭam- yaduktaṃ sandigdhaviparyastāvyutpannabuddhyanugrahārtho hi satāṃ viniścayaḥ śāstrakathetyasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2107: kintarhi yadā prativādī paryanuyuṅkte- kiṃ jijñāsasa iti avaśyamabhidhānīyaṃ śabdamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2111: yastu na paryanuyuṅkte na taṃ pratyete vācyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2112: kvacidānarthakyāt sarvatra prasaṅga iti cenna itareṣāmapi tatprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2114: tathā ca bhavatoktaṃ kasyacittu kiñcit prasiddhameva bhavatītyanyataroktirapi sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2120: yo hi paryanuyuñjīta kiṃ prayojano 'yaṃ śakyo vāyamartha iti taṃ prati vācyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2124: kintarhi yaṃ pratyeṣāṃ pratipattāvaṅgabhāvagamanaṃ taṃ pratyetāni sādhanamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2125: yadapyuktaṃ sādhyābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñābhyupagamāddhetudṛṣṭāntayorapi tatprasaṅga iti ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2127: yadyapi sādhyaśabdo 'yamaviśeṣeṇa siddhatvādarthāntaramācaṣṭe tathāpi yaṃ prati jijñāsāsaṃśayaprayojanaśakyaprāptayastasya vyudasya saṃśayaṃ sādhyasyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā,
GSP31yuktdipu:2130: yadā tu jijñāsādayo hetau dṛṣṭānte vā bhavanti
GSP31yuktdipu:2131: tadā kiṃ kṛtakaḥ śabdo 'tha na kṛtako 'tha buddhirnityā kṣaṇikā veti bhavatyeva tadavadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2134: yathā sādhyavatvenepsitaḥ pakṣa iti pratijñālakṣaṇamācakṣāṇo bhavānna sādhyalakṣaṇamācaṣṭe, kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2136: evaṃ sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ hetulakṣaṇamācakṣāṇā vayaṃ na sādhanamācakṣmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:2137: kasmāt ? sādhyate 'neneti kṛtvā sādhanamiti loke siddhatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2149: katham ? na hi samāsaśabdasyāyamartha iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2156: yattūktamabhidheyasya vākyānavayavatvātpañcāvayavatvavirodha iti arthe 'sambhavācchabde kāryaṃ vijñāsyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2168: yathā vākyam evaṃ ca tadarthaśca mukhyau śabdārthau,
GSP31yuktdipu:2172: tathaikasya sādhanasya sādhyadharmatatsahabhāvitvalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmabhidhānaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntādināvayavāntaraṃ naḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2173: tatra yaduktaṃ pratijñāhetvarthābhidhānād dṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanānāṃ nāvayavāntaratvamiti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2179: tatrānvayadinā svarūpeṇādhigate pradhānalakṣaṇe dharmiṇi parapakṣapratiṣedhamātreṇopasaṃhāre kriyamāṇe pariśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2181: tena yathā hetuvirodhātparamāṇvadibhyo na vyaktamutpadyate tathā hetvabhāvāt pradhānādapi notpadyate iti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2184: svarūpeṇa tu paricchinne dharmiṇi upasaṃhāro yathāvadavakalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2185: na cetparamāṇvādibhyo vyaktamutpadyate pariśeṣataḥ pradhānādeva vyaktamutpadyate iti yathoktebhyo 'nvayādibhya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2188: yadi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānātsarvaṃ parokṣamadhigamyate ityabhyupagamyate prāptamidaṃ yeṣāmapyarthānāṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabdhisteṣāmapi tasmādeva grahaṇam / tadyathā-
GSP31yuktdipu:2204: yathā yathā tu viprakarṣaṃ pratipadyate praṇidhāya cakṣurgṛhyate tāvadyāvatkrameṇādarśanamupasaṃprāptaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2207: tathā girisaritsamudrasamīpavartinaṃ śravaṇapratighātinaṃ prāk śabdamupalabhya paścāttasminneva deśe śabdamagṛhṇānāḥ śravaṇopaghātamanumimate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2212_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tasmādapi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānādyanna siddhyati pratyakṣagrāhyamapi
GSP31yuktdipu:2214: yadi tarhyāgamaḥ pramāṇīkriyate tena pratiśāstraṃ ye 'bhiyuktāsteṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2217: tasmādbhiṣajeva bhavatā paropadeśaḥ prayukto nāsmānayaṃ prīṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2225: yasya khalvapi yo viṣayastasya tasminviṣaye vaco 'ntareṇāpi sādhanaṃ pramāṇamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2230: yathā kṛtakatvādidharmo 'nityatvādau viṣaye dṛṣṭastadabhāve cādṛṣṭa ityanitye 'rthe niścayamādadhāti evaṃ śabdo 'pi svārthe tajjātīye na dṛṣṭaḥ pratipattiheturbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2249: tathā hi kṛtakatvāditi liṅgaṃ caṇḍālakāpālikairapi prayujyamānaṃ sāhacaryāpekṣaṃ niścayamādadhāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2257: kālāntare tu svārthaṃ na pratyāyayati arthāntaraṃ ca praśaṃsati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2263: na hi pratyakṣābhimatasya liṅgina upalabdhau gavāderliṅgaṃ nopalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2277: na hi dhūmognerapakṛṣya śakyate 'psu vāyāvākāśe 'nyatra vā niveśayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2279: yatha vṛddhyādayaḥ śabdāḥ svārthābhyuccayādiṣu prasiddhā ādaikṣu viniveśyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2281: sarvābhidhānaśaktitvācchabdasyādoṣa iti cet syānmataṃ sarvābhidhānaśaktiḥ śabdaḥ sarvābhidheyaśaktiścārthastayoḥ puruṣavyāpāreṇa śaktyavavacchedaḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2285: tasmācchabdasya svābhāvikaḥ sambandho vaktrapekṣayā vyajyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2289: kasmāt ? na hi yathā vakrapekṣayā sarvārthasya sataḥ śabdasya śaktyavacchedastathā sarvārthaṃ liṅgaṃ vaktrapekṣayārthāntarādavacchidyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2290: yathā caikaḥ śabdo jagatyevamuditaḥ puruṣaviniyogāpekṣaḥ sarvamarthamabhidhātuṃ samarthastathaikaṃ liṅgaṃ kayācidyuktyā sarvārthapratyāyanasamartham /
GSP31yuktdipu:2304: sā tu pramāṇaviṣayā na tu prameyaviṣayā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2311: yasya hi śabdasyārthaḥ pratyakṣato 'numānato vā nopalabhyate sa na pramāṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2316: tasmādyathā vibhurātmā sarvatra sukhādisambhavādityevamādayo bauddhaṃ prati dharmyasiddhatvādayo yathārthāstathā vedaśabdā api prāyeṇeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2319: kā hyatra yuktiryadasmadādibhiranupalabhyamānārthaṃ pramāṇabhūtānāmapi vākyamayathārthaṃ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2323: tatra yadi śabdasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ yathārthatvamāśrīyate tena na kevalaṃ svargādayaḥ kiṃ tarhi śabdā evāpramāṇamiti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2324: anumānasya ca pramāṇāntaranirapekṣasya gamakatvābhyupagamādāgamasya tato 'rthāntaratvaṃ sutarāṃ prasajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2325: tasmādyuktāgamavirodhina evaṃvidhā nāstikavādāḥ śreyo 'rthibhirdūrādapohyā iti sthitametat- anumānādasiddhaṃ vastu yattadāptāgamātsādhyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2326: evamasya trividhasya pramāṇasyaindriyikaṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabhyamānaṃ ca prameyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2347: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ anupalabdhau kāraṇāntarānupapatteḥ pradhānasyāsattvaprasaṅga iti, atrāstu /
GSP31yuktdipu:2363: evaṃ siddhe yatpratijñādvayaṃ karoti tat jñāpayatyācāryaḥ vītāvītābhyāmabhipretārthasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2365: ekasmiṃśca viṣaye dvau prayuṃjānaḥ samuccayena siddhiṃ dyotayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2367: yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ na pṛthakpratipattihetū vītāvītāviti tadiṣṭamevaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2379: āha, kiṃ punastatkāryaṃ yadbhavānpradhānasyāstitve liṅgamācaṣṭa iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2381: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31yuktdipu:2382: taddhi mahadahaṃkārendriyaviśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ pradhānena visadṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ cetyupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2384: kiṃ punaradhikṛtyedamucyate prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca mahadādi kāryamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2386: etāni ca parasparavaidharmyasādharmyapratipattimantareṇa na śakyāni vijñātumityevamarthamidaṃ prastūyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2395: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet syānmatam- asaṅgatārthaṃ prakaraṇāntaramupakṣipyate bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2396: na cāvidyamānasambandhasya saṃśayasya prakaraṇāntare 'bhidhīyamānasya nirṇītiṃ sādhvīmācāryā manyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2408: na hi naḥ kāraṇādarthāntarabhūtaṃ kāryamutpadyata ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2409: kiṃ tarhi viśvātmakānāṃ sattvarajastamasāmapagataviśeṣāviśeṣāḥ sanmātralakṣaṇopacayāḥ pratinivṛttapariṇāmavyāpārāḥ paramavibhāgamupasaṃprāptāḥ sūkṣmāḥ śaktayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2411: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāmasata utpattau kaḥ prasaṅga iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2412: etenaiva bāhyānāṃ tantvādikāryāṇāṃ paṭādīnāṃ sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvādasata utpattiḥ pratiṣiddhā boddhavyā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2416: yadi hi sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvaṃ kāryasya siddhaṃ syādata etadyujyate vaktum- tadabhyupagamādasadutpatteraprasaṅga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2421: iha śrotrādīnāṃ viṣayabhūtasya tatsannidhānādavaśyaṃ grahaṇena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2422: yadi ca prāgutpatteḥ satkāryaṃ syāt tadapi śrotrādisannidhānāt gṛhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:2427: asti prāgutpatteḥ kāryasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ tasmādasya sato 'pyagrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2455: na tu prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya kriyāguṇavyapadeśasambhavaḥ tasmādasatkāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2458: iha prāgvyāpāropakramāt kartārastasmātphalamupalipsamānāḥ kāryaviśeṣaniyatasāmārthyaṃ sādhanamupādāya vyāpriyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2462: pariṇāmādyupapatterna doṣa iti cet syānmataṃ kāraṇasya pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayakṣaṇāndharmān yasmāt kartrādīni kurvanti nānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2467: pariṇāmo hi nāmāvasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttiḥ dharmāntarapravṛttiśca /
GSP31yuktdipu:2476: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yaḥ kriyārthaḥ sādhanānāmādau parispandaḥ so 'nte 'pi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2477: vā yo 'nte virāmaḥ sa ādāvapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2482: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yathā niṣpannasyotpattidharmeṇābhisambandhaḥ tathā ādāvapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2493: ucyate- yaduktaṃ dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattipratijñānānna sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvāt satkāryamityatra brūmaha- tadasiddhiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:2495: yadi tantvādibhyo dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattiḥ syāt tena yathā tantukalāpe paṭastatraiva vā paṭāntaramāhitaṃ bhedenopalabhyate tathaivopalabhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:2508: mahāparimāṇaṃ dravyamanyatrāhitaṃ samavāyāt bhedena nopalabhyate ityetasminnarthe paryanuyuktasya kaste dṛṣṭāntaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2510: vyāpte na grahaṇamiti cet syānmatamakāryakāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ satyapi sambandhe na dravyāntaraṃ vyaśnuta ityato bhedena gṛhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2518: vemādivat iti cet syādetat- yathā satyarthāntarabhāve vemādayo 'vayavinaḥ kāraṇam evaṃ tantavo 'pi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2536: sa hyavayaveṣu vartamānaḥ kṛtsneṣu vā vartate pratyavayavaṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2540: yadanekeṣu vartate tasya kṛtsnādhāragrahaṇe sati grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2552: tataśca yacchāstraṃ mūrtimatāmasamānadeśatvamiti tasya vyāghāto 'vayavaparimāṇaṃ ca prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2554: tataśca yacchāstraṃ dravyamanekadravyamadravyaṃ vā tasya hāniretāvatā cāsya vṛttirbhavantī bhavet /
GSP31yuktdipu:2557: arthāntarāvasthāne 'rthāntarotpattivināśadarśanādanyatvamiti cet syādetat - vidyamāneṣu tantuṣu paṭo na bhavati saṃyogalakṣaṇasya kāraṇāntarasyānutpatteḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2586: te cāpi cānarthānatve sati senādiṣu dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2599: yo hi yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇyarthāntarabhūtānyāhitāni tathā kāraṇe kāryamastītyetadācaṣṭe taṃ pratyayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2607: tatha tantvādīnāmapi bhāvānāṃ kāraṇābhimatā kāryābhimatā cāvasthā krameṇa vā sthiraśca bhavat tannimittastadgrahaṇāgrahaṇavikalpaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2612: kāryakāraṇapṛthaktvavādinastatkriyāguṇānāṃ pṛthaktvamanumātuṃ yuktamityatastantvavasthāne paṭakriyāguṇagrahaṇādanumānābhāva ityayamupālambhaḥ sāvakāśaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2613: asmākantu kāraṇamātrasyaiva saṃghātādākārāntaraparigrahādvā kriyāguṇānāṃ pracitirvyaktiviśeṣo bhavatīti bruvatāmadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2621: vipratipattau hi satyāṃ liṅgataḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya samadhigamaṃ kariṣyāma iti prakṛtamevaitat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2624: karmaguṇā aguṇā iti vacanādutpannamātraṃ dravyaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nirguṇamavatiṣṭhate iti vaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2629: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthaṃ pratijñāya pratiṣidhyamānena siddhabuddhiviṣayatā smartavyetyetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavivādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2637: yadyubhayapakṣaprasiddhasyāsataḥ kriyāyogaḥ syāt ata etadyujyate vaktum kārye sati kartuḥ prayāso 'narthaka iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2640_0: hetvabhidhānādasiddhiriti cet syādetat- yathā niṣpannatvānmadhvādīnāṃ dhāraṇasamartho
GSP31yuktdipu:2640_1: ghaṭo na kriyata ityayamapadiṣṭo heturasmābhiḥ evamitthaṃ kāryasyāsataḥ kāraṇaṃ nopapannamiti noktaṃ bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2644: taddhi kriyamāṇaṃ sati vā sambandhe kārakaiḥ kriyate 'sati vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2650: pravṛttikāle kartrādīnāṃ kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādavastubhūtaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasthānīyaṃ vaḥ kāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2652: atha niṣpattikāle 'bhisambadhyate yaduktaṃ sato niṣpannatvātkriyānutpattiriti tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2653: atha matamasatyapi sambandhe niṣpattirbhavatīti tena kārakavyāpāravaiyarthyaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2654: prāgapi ca kārakopādānātkāryaniṣpattiprasaṅga iti / uktaṃ ca
GSP31yuktdipu:2658: āha, nanu ca madhyame kāle kartrādibhiḥ kāryaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2659: kaḥ punarasau madhyamaḥ kāla iti ? āha-
GSP31yuktdipu:2663: yadā hetavaḥ pravṛttārambhā bhavantyuddiśya kāryaṃ na ca tāvannaimittikasyātmalābhaḥ saṃvartate sa madhyamaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2668: sadasadrūpā cāvasthā nāsti yo madhyamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2671: pūrvadoṣāparihārāduddiśya kāryaṃ tasyātmano lābhātmakena saha sambandha iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2673: tasmāccitramapi vākyaṃ prasārya na kiṃcitparihṛtaṃ bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2674: tasmādyuktametat satyasati vā sambandhe doṣaprasaṃgādasanna kriyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2675: yasya punaḥ satkāryaṃ tasya doṣo nāsti / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2679: tasmācca nārthāntaraṃ kāryam ityataḥ kāraṇenābhisambaddhānāṃ kārakāṇāṃ kāryeṇaiva sambandho bhavatītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2680: āha- nanu ca yasyāpi satkāryaṃ tasyopādānādarthāntaraṃ tatkāryaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2691: upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato 'rthāntaratvasāmānyāttantuvatsarvasmātkāraṇātkāryasya sambhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2694: kiṃcānyat, jātibhedaprasaṃgādarthāntarārambhaprasaṅgācca upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato yathā vemādibhyo bhinnajātīyo bhinnadeśaśca,
GSP31yuktdipu:2695: tathā tantubhyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt yathā cāvasthite paṭe vemādayaḥ paṭāntaraṃ kurvanti tathā hyavasthite paṭe tantavo 'pi paṭāntaramārabheran /
GSP31yuktdipu:2720: yadyatrāsti tatra tadarthamupādīyate iti pūrvaṃ bhavatātisṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2721: idānīṃ tvavagamavigamārthaṃ sato 'pyupādānamiti brūvato mārgāntaragamanaṃ pūrvavādatyāgo 'naikāntikasya cāparihāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2725: sato dharmāntarasya nirodhamasataścotpattiṃ pariṇāmamabhidadhato vyaktamayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2727: kiṃ tarhi sādhanānugṛhītasya dharmiṇo dharmāntarasyāvirbhāvaḥ pūrvasya ca tirobhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2729: vyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayāstu kimasato dharmā uta svato 'santa iti vicāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2731: yadi tāvadasato dharmāḥ yathā kasyeti vācyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2740: upetya vaiṣāmutpattiṃ brūmaḥ- yadi hi pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayamātraṃ kāryamiṣyate yaduktaṃ dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhanta iti tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2744_0: katham ? ātmabhūtaṃ hi tantūnāṃ paṭākhyaṃ vyūhasthānīyaṃ sanniveśaviśeṣaṃ yadā kārakāṇi
GSP31yuktdipu:2744_1: svena svena vyāpāreṇāviṣkurvanti tadā kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityevamādirlokasya
GSP31yuktdipu:2745: yadā tu kārakāṇi śaktyantarāvirbhāvātsaṃsthānāntareṇautsukyavartitāmavasthāmupasaṃharanti tadā prāgupalabdhaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vināśaśabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2749: sadasadviṣayaṃ janmeti vivāde 'nuṣakte janmaśabdaḥ prāgabhūtasya sadbhāvamācaṣṭa iti brūvato 'nuktasamam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2750: puruṣādāvadṛṣṭatvādasiddhiriti cet syādetat yadi tarhi kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityeṣorthaḥ sadviṣayaḥ kalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:2756: yadā bhāvaḥ svato 'narthāntarabhūtaṃ saṃsthānaṃ bhajate tadaite śabdāḥ pravartanta ityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2757: dṛṣṭaṃ ca loke tadyathā muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalāni karoti janayatyutpādayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2759: ubhayapakṣaprasiddhe tu śaśaviṣāṇādau naite śabdāḥ pravartante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2769: āsti cāyaṃ paṭasya vemādīnāṃ ca niyamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2771: sahakārivattanniyama iti cet syānmatam yathāpo bījāṅkurasyotpattau samarthā bhavanti na kāṣṭhādagnervā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2774: yathā ca sūryaḥ sūryakāntādagnimutpādayituṃ samartho na candrakāntācca pānīyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2776: tathā ca tattvādīnāṃ paṭasyaiva śaktiniyamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2777: na ca paṭasya tantuṣu sattvaṃ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2785: yattūktamapāṃ vicchinnavānna tāsvaṅkuro 'stīti tatrāpi yāsāmapāṃ bījānupraveśadaṅkurabhāvena vipariṇāmastābhyastasyānanyatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2789: tadyathā vijñānotpattihetutve sati na rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nedānīṃ tatsāmānyāt rūpamapyarūpaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2790: evaṃ paṭakāraṇatvādvemādayo na paṭa iti nedānīṃ tantavopyapaṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2796: kāraṇāntarātkāryotpattidarśanādanyatra tadbuddhiriti cet syānmataṃ prākkāraṇāntarātkāryāntarasyāsata utpattimupalabhya paścātkāraṇāntare kāraṇabuddhirbhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2807: asattvāviśeṣe 'pi paṭasya kāraṇamasti na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyatra heturanuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2809: yathā tulyatve sattve paṭasya kāraṇamasti na puruṣasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:2814: saṃsthānavattadviśeṣa iti cet syānmataṃ yathā sattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ saṃsthānaṃ na puruṣa evamasattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ kāryaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2821: tadupapattau vā sattvaprasaṃga iti / āha ca-
GSP31yuktdipu:2828: “tantuṣveva tathāstheṣu paṭa ityādibuddhayaḥ” ityevamādinā nyāyenāvayavipratiṣedhātsaṃyogo 'pi na saṃyogibhyasteṣāmarthāntaramiṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2829: tatraitāvatī parikalpanā syāt- yaduta tantusaṃyogo vā paṭaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:2836: yathā cāsatkāryaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā caśabdātsadasatkāryamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2839: kasmāt ? sattve hetvabhidhānānniścitaḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sadbhāvaḥ // 9 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:2845: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ceti vacanādvairūpyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2848: adhigatasārūpyasya hi sukhaṃ vairūpyasya pratipattirbhavatīti prāksārūpyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2849_0: yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣasāmānyamuktvā
GSP31yuktdipu:2859: vicchinnaṃ hi vairūpyamatastatpūrvamabhidhāya prakaraṇāṅgaṃ sārūpyaṃ sukhamabhidhātumityevamarthamācāryeṇaivaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2860: kathaṃ sārūpyasya prakaraṇāṅgatvamiti cet traiguṇyābhidhānadvāreṇa guṇalakṣaṇopadeśāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2866: āha- yadi tarhi bhavānprāgvairūpyābhidhānaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyate tadvaktavyaṃ kiṃ punaridaṃ vairūpyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2885: ete hetumadādayaḥ paratantrāntā nirapavādāḥ vyaktasyāsādhāraṇā pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ dharmāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2887: vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ heturastīti aviśeṣa evāyaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2889: yadyapi vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāmaviśiṣṭaṃ hetumattvaṃ tathāpi viśiṣṭasya kārakasya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2890: sa ca vyaktasyaiva nānyasyeti nāyamaviśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2894: sāmānyaśabdāśca nārthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarābhisambandhamantareṇa viśeṣe 'vatiṣṭhanta iti viśeṣa upādeyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2898: iha yaḥ sarvasaṃbhavī dharma ekaviṣaya upādīyate tasmātprakarṣo vijñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2899: tadyathā bhoktā māṇavaka ityukte sarveṣāṃ bhoktṛtvasya saṃbhavādevaṃ vijñāyate prakarṣeṇāyaṃ bhokteti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2911: utpādyavyaṅgyayorhi vināśaṃ paṭādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt avyabhicārāttantrāntarīyā manyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2916: antato vināśe 'pi na kaścidarthaḥ śabdabuddhibhyāṃ na vyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2919: tathā ca saṃskṛtamapyevaṃ kalpyamāne vināśi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2922: yathaiva hi nāsata utpattirastyevaṃ sato 'pi vināśena na bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2923: atha sato 'pi vināśo 'bhyupagamyate tena pralayakāle vinaṣṭānāṃ tattvādīnāṃ praścādasatāmutpattiḥ satkāryavādaṃ nirākuryāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2928: kāraṇānāṃ tu yaḥ parasparaṃ saṃsargāt saṃsthānaviśeṣaparigrahastasya virodhiśaktyantarāvirbhavādvyaktistirodhīyata ityetad vināśaśabdena vivakṣitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2929: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- “tadetat trailokyaṃ vyakterapaiti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2932: sa tu dvividhaḥ- ā sargapralayāt tattvānāṃ kiñcitkālāntarāvasthānāditareṣām” iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2936: teṣāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyo vā na vaktavyaṃ dvividhamanityamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2943: asti cānte kṣayaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ tasmāt kṣaṇikāḥ ucyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2952: yadi hi avinaṣṭāyāṃ jvālāyāmindhanāntarāle jvālāntaramutpadyeta vṛddhirapi syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:2956: yadāśrayā jvālotpattistadutpadyamānaivāsau niruṇaddhīti na yuktamasyā vināśrayeṇāvasthātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2963: katham ? tasyāpi yadi vināśo na syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:2967: pāṇyupaghātajo hi śabda utpatterūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti pratyakṣasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:2976: tatra yaduktaṃ sādhyatvāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvasya na saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikā ityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2982: sa tu vināśa ekakṣaṇamavasthitānāṃ jvālānāṃ bhavati na punaḥ kṣaṇadvayamityetadapramāṇakamājñāmātrañca gṛhītaśikṣākaḥ kaḥ pratipattumutsaheta ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2986: kiṃ tāvadyasya dvaidhībhāvo dṛṣṭastadakṣaṇikamāhosvid yasya na dṛṣṭastat kṣaṇikamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2987: kiñcātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvadevamabhyupagamyate yasya dvaidhībhāvastadakṣaṇikamiti tantorakṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2988: atha mataṃ yasya dvaidhīkaraṇaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tat kṣaṇikamiti yathā kimatrodāharaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2993: yattūktaṃ niyamadarśanānna vyaṅgyaḥ śabda iti tadayuktam, anekāntāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3001: tadyathā- cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca deśabhede 'pi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3004: buddhestu svādhikāra eva kṣaṇikatve heturiti karaṇo (kāraṇam ?) vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3005: tatra yaduktamante kṣayadarśanāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdavat kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārā ityetadayuktamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3006: āha- itastarhi pradīpādīnāmanyeṣāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3008: naṣṭaścedartho 'bhyupagamyate nanu prāptamidamutpannamātrasyāsya vināśavighno nāstīti kauṭasthyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ prāptamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3012: sati vinaśvaratve saṃskāropayoge tu sthityapabhraṃśa ityato 'sti kiñcitkālamavasthānaṃ bhāvānām /
GSP31yuktdipu:3020: kāraṇāvasthānāt na doṣa iti cet- syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:3026: prāguktaṃ yena naṃṣṭavyamasau mantrauṣadhaprayogairapi kṣaṇādūrddhvaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3027: sāmprataṃ tu naṃṣṭrī santatiḥ kāraṇavaśādeva tiṣṭhatīti so 'yaṃ pūrvahetutyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3044: sa tu hetumattvena kathaṃ virotsyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3050: kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca te ghaṭādayo na bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3052: tatsadṛśotpatteradoṣa iti cet syādetat - utpattisamakālaṃ nirodhe 'pi ghaṭasyānyasya tādṛśasyotpattirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:3058: syādetadevaṃ yadi tadānīṃ sadṛśotpattau kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3073: iha ghaṭād ghaṭe nirvṛttirna prasiddhā loke /
GSP31yuktdipu:3075: buddhiśabdavaditi cet syādetat yathā buddhirbuddhyantaraṃ sadṛśaṃ sūte,
GSP31yuktdipu:3078: kasmāt ? siddhaṃ hi buddherbuddhyantaraṃ śabdācca śabdāntaraṃ jāyata ityetadapyasmākaṃ prasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:3080: tatra yaduktaṃ sadṛśotpatteḥ so 'yamiti grahaṇamavicchinnaṃ kṣaṇikatve 'pi bhāvānāmityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3083: yadā na kāraṇamasti na tadā kāryamutpadyate dvayorghaṭayoryugapadupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3084: yadā tu kāryamutpadyate tadā kāraṇaṃ niruddhamiti nirbījaḥ pradurbhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3087: anutpanne hetusāmarthyādadoṣa iti cet syāttadanutpanne kārye kāraṇena prayojanam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3093: aṃga tāvat aṇuśo vibhajyatāmagnau vā kṣipyantām,
GSP31yuktdipu:3097: yugapatkāryakāraṇayorutpattinirodhau tulānatonnatavaditi cet syādetadyathā nāmonnāmau tulāntaryā (?)
GSP31yuktdipu:3102: tulyā tasya hyekasyāvanatiravasthā tad dvitīyasyonnataye heturbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:3106: viśeṣagrahaṇāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti cet syānmatam- yadyutpannamātroparatirnāsti bhāvānāṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3107: kiṃkayutaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ prāṇāpānaśramarūpādikṛto 'bjāśmaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca śītoṣṇasparśakṛto bhedaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3118: ********************** Here in the Ms, a considerable portion is left blank and it is apparent that discussion on the karikas 11 and 12 has been left out ********************** @#----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:3122: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3126: yat kiṃcitkāryakaraṇe laghu prakāśaṃ ca tatsattvarūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3141: yatkiṃcid gauravaṃ varaṇaṃ copalabhyate tattamorūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3145: ityeṣa sattvādīnāmavyatikareṇa svabhāvopalambho yata eṣāṃ nānātvamavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3148: rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiriti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3150: iha guṇabhūtasya bhaktitaḥ pradhānopakāritve sati bhaktitastadrūpopapattirdṛṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3152: taddhi mukhādiṣu dṛṣṭapratilabdhapravṛttiḥ pittasya svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārāttiktaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3154: sattvamapi straiṇaguṇabhūtaṃ sapatnīrajasaḥ svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārādduḥkhaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3156: evaṃ kṣātraṃ rajaḥ āryadāralakṣaṇasya sattvasya dasyulakṣaṇasya ca tamasaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3157: evaṃ medhyaṃ tamaḥ kārṣike sattvasya proṣitadayitāyāśca rajasaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3161: yadā caite 'ṅgabhāvamapagacchanto madhyasthāstulyasaṃskārāśca pratipadyante tadā svarūpeṇaiva /
GSP31yuktdipu:3166: yathoktaṃ tatra kathamidamekāntena niścīyante guṇabhāvātsattvādīnāṃ rūpāntaragrahaṇaṃ na punastādrūpyādeveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3168: yadi straiṇaṃ sattvaṃ tādrūpyādeva sapatnyā tena gṛhyate tena bharturapi tathā grahaṇaprasaṃgo madhyasthānāṃ tulyasaṃskārāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3172: uttarakālaṃ svarūpagrahaṇānnivṛttānuśayābhiścaikārthatāmupagatābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ svenaiva rūpeṇa straiṇasya sattvasya grahaṇamupalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3180: ityatra brūmaḥ - asti cāyaṃ virodho guṇānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3183_1: vṛttaya ekatra saṃmūrchitāḥ sahabhāvaḥ prakṛṣṭamapi kālamanubhavanti evaṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3183_2: sati virodhe mahadādyekakāryasādhanabhāvopagatānāṃ vṛttaya ekatra mūrchitāḥ saha bhavantīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3184: yuktyabhāvādasiddhiriti cet syānmatam - kā punaratra yuktiryena virodhināmekakāryatā bhavatīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3186: guṇabhūto hi pratiyogī pradhānabhūtena tadupakarakatvānna virudhyata iti saṃsargeṇa varttitumutsahate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3187: tulyabalayostu dvayoḥ satyameva sahāvasthānasya nāsti sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3188: tathā ca bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ paṭhati rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3197: yadi laghvādilakṣaṇabhedātsattvādīnāṃ nānātvaṃ mitho 'bhyupagamyate tena laghutvaprakāśatvayorapi bhedo 'sti guṇadvayaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3198: evamupastambhacalatābhyāṃ gauravavaraṇābhyāṃ ca dvayaṃ dvayamiti ṣaḍguṇāḥ prāpnuvanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3199: atha mataṃ laghutvaprakāśayorabheda iti pṛthaganabhidhānaṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3200: tadbhede vā grahaṇabhedamanicchataḥ prāpto laghutvādibhede 'pi guṇābhedastathā caiko guṇa iti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3204: yadi hi rajaso 'ṅgabhāvamupagacchatsattvamupakārāttadrūpaṃ bhavati tena pratijñātasya rūpāntarasyopasaṃhārāttrairūpyaṃ guṇānāmekaikasya prāptam rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3208: paramarṣerapi guṇānāṃ kāryameva pratyakṣaṃ na śaktimātreṇāvasthānamasaṃvedyatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3212: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇanānātvavādino lakṣaṇadvayayogādekaikasya guṇaṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti tanna /
GSP31yuktdipu:3217: tadanarthāntaraṃ dharmāsta iti nāsti ṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3219: na hyetatkvacitprasiddham yathā yāvanto dharmāstāvanto dharmiṇa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3223: athaitadaniṣṭaṃ na tarhi vaktavyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇānāṃ ṣaṭtvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3227: na ca bhaktiḥ paramārtha ityasthāne yatnaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3230: tathā strīkṣatrameghāḥ prakṛtāsteṣvaṅgabhāvamagacchata iti vijñāyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3238: āha- avivekyādiridānīṃ gaṇaḥ kathaṃ pratipattavya iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3245: tatra viṣayatvamacetanatvaṃ prasavadharmitvaṃ ca na bhavatīti purastātpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3260: yadi kārye dṛṣṭasya dharmasya kāraṇe sadbhāvo 'bhyupagamyate prāptau hetumadādīnāmapi dharmāṇāṃ kāryadṛṣṭatvātpradhāne prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3261: atha kāryopalabdhau tulyāyāṃ hetumadādayo neṣyante na tarhītareṣāmapi kāraṇāvasthitirastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3265: katham ? yadi tāvaddhetumadādayo vyakte dṛṣṭatvātpradhāne vyañjante,
GSP31yuktdipu:3268: ahetumadādayaḥ pradhāne 'bhyupagamādvyakterapi prāpyante tādṛśāḥ kāraṇāsambhavātkāryameva tanna bhavatīti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3274: siddhe hi vyaktāvyaktayoḥ kāraṇatve etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3284: avyaktasya tu sadbhāva evāsiddha ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3286: kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakatvādvyaktasya ca kāryatvādavyaktasadbhāve pratipattiriti cet syādetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3298: kāryaṃ cedavyaktamataḥ saṃśayaḥ kimindradhanurvadakasmādasya prādurbhāvo 'tha māyādivadasato 'tha kāraṇātsato ghaṭavaditi ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3306: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau tṛtīyamāhnikaṃ prathamaṃ ca prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
GSP31yuktdipu:3318: satyaṃ, sāmprate kāle mahadādayo yuktaparimāṇāḥ pratyakṣānumānopalabdheḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3322: idānīmetāvanto bhedā ityetacchakyamanumātum atītānāgatayostu kālayornāsti prasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3325: mahadādīnāṃ ye bhedā devamanuṣyatiryañco ghaṭādayaśca teṣāmaśakyaṃ parimāṇaṃ paricchettum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3327: asti śarīrāṇāṃ mahābhūtasāmānyaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca pṛthivīsāmānyaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3334: tattvabhedena parimitā bhedā ityetadvivakṣitaṃ yathoktamasmābhiruktaṃ ca yadyasti tattvāntaramucyatām /
GSP31yuktdipu:3336: tathāvidhenāpi tu tena saṃvyavahāro na pratiṣidhyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3340: iha yena bhedānāṃ samanupagatistasya sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3346: sukhādibhiḥ śabdādayo 'nugamyanta ityetadaprasiddham kena kāraṇena pratipattavyamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3348: iha śabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ sannidhāne svasaṃskāraviśeṣayogātsukhaduḥkhamohākārāḥ prāṇināṃ buddhaya utpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3365: naiva brūmo yo yasya vikāraḥ sa tajjātīyaka iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3366: kiṃ tarhi yo yajjātīyakaḥ sa tasya vikāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3369: na caitadudāharaṇaṃ prasiddhaṃ agnyādayaḥ svakāraṇajātiṃ nānuvidadhatīta /
GSP31yuktdipu:3372: bherīvikāraḥ śabdo na tu yathā bherīrūpamavasthitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3373: pradīpeneva tu daṇḍābhighātena vyajyata iti sādhyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3380: iha yāvatī kācilloke pravṛttirupalabhyate sā sarvā śaktitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3381: tadyathā kumbhakārasya daṇḍādisādhanavinyāsalakṣaṇāyāśca śakteḥ sannidhānād ghaṭakaraṇe pravṛttirasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3388: yadi śaktipūrvikā pravṛttiriti manyadhvaṃ tena yāvatpravṛttirnopalabhyate tāvacchaktirnāstītyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3390: yadi khalvapi vidyamānā śaktiḥ kenacitprabandhena kāryaṃ notpādayecchaktitaraśaktetyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3393: tatra yaduktaṃ prākpravṛtteḥ śaktidarśanādvyaktasyāpi niṣpādikā śaktirastītyetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3395: iha pradhānameva vā śaktiḥ syāt pradhānādvā bhinnā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3397: tadyadi tāvatpradhānameva śaktistena kārye bhedācchaktibhedo 'vasīyata iti śaktibhedātpradhānanānātvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3400: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti pradhānādarthāntarabhāvaḥ śaktīnāmabhyupagamyate tena bhinnānāṃ śaktīnāṃ pravṛttitaḥ siddhau pradhānasiddhirnāstītyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3409: na ca kāryānupalabdhau kāryābhāva ityetalloke prasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:3410: yatpunaruktaṃ kāryaniṣpattau śakteḥ svarūpahānamiti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3414: na ca śakyate vaktuṃ pradīpasya prakāśanaśaktiraśakteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3417: yattūktaṃ sahakāribhāvāntarasannidhānātpravṛttisamakālamevārthānāṃ śaktiprādurbhāva iti atra brūmaḥ- tadaprasiddhiḥ śaktyapekṣatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3418: iha sarvaḥ kartā svagatāṃ śaktimapekṣya tadyogyatayā sahakāribhāvāntaramupādatte,
GSP31yuktdipu:3422: yatpunaretaduktaṃ tāvadeva pradhvaṃsaṃ iti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3424: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3426: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ syātkāryaniṣṭhaiva na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3431: athāpi syādekasyāṃ śaktau kṣaṇasādhyamaṃśamavasāya vinaṣṭāyāmanyattatsadṛśaṃ śaktyantaramutpadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3436: ko hyatra heturyena vināśasamakālamanyacchaktirūpaṃ kāryamavasīyayati na punaḥ prāktanamevāvasthitamiti ? kiṃ cānyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3438: kṣaṇottarakālāvasthāne ca bhāvānāṃ yo doṣa upāttaḥ kauṭasthyaprasaṃga iti tasya parihāra uktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3444: ko hyatra nirbandhaḥ tasyāṃ vinaṣṭāyāmanyā pravṛttyantaraheturbhavati naiva punaḥ saiveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3447: tatra yenaiva hetunā ekaṃ ghaṭamavasāya na vinaśyati tenaiva yāvanti kartavyānīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3451: na tasya nānātvaṃ śaktyekatvaṃ vā prasajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3463_0: yathaiva hi devadattādhārayā kriyayā tasya deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyātyantādṛṣṭaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3466: kāraṇaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca kāraṇakārye tayorvibhāgaḥ kāryakāraṇavibhāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3467: idaṃ kāraṇamidaṃ kāryamiti buddhyā dvidhāvasthāpanaṃ vibhāgo yaḥ sa kāraṇakāryavibhāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3479: āha, kaḥ punarvyaktasya parasyaparasya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3490: yo 'yaṃ guṇānāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamairitaretaropakāro 'bhyupagamyate sa khalu krameṇa vā syāt yugapadvā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3494: yadi tāvatsattvaṃ pūrvaṃ guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ svaśaktita eva prakāśate tayorupakārakamityāśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3495: tena yathā sattvamevamitarāvapyupakāranirapekṣau svakāryaṃ kariṣyata ityupakārānarthakyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3496: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa ityato yaugapadyamāśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3502: iha sattvaṃ prakāśamānaṃ rajastamasorvidyamānaṃ vā prakāśamāviṣkuryāt avidyamānaṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3506: yathā sattvasya prakāśaktirastītyatastad guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ prakāśate tadvaditarāvapītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3508: tena yaduktaṃ prākpravṛttereva tiṣṭhante śaktaya iti tad hīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3512: tathā hi sattvādayaḥ parasparopakāriṇo na cāvasthitabhāvapūrvakāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3522: yeṣāṃ tu kāryamekaṃ sahabhāve tu teṣāmupakāro na pratiṣidhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3527: dṛṣṭaḥ khalu vegenordhvagamane vāyoraraghaṭṭādīnāṃ yugapadupakāraḥ na kaściddoṣaḥ tathā guṇānāmapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3528: saṃyoganimitta iti cet sādhyaṃ kimarthāntarabhūtamuta prāptimātraṃ saṃyoga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3531_1: vyaktiḥ na cāvidyamānayoratha caikakāryasiddhiryathā ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ parasparopakāritvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3535: tatra ye tāvatpradhānāvasthānubhāvino guṇāsteṣāṃ śaktimātrarūpatvādanirdeśyaprakāśādisvabhāvānāṃ nāsti tannibandhana upakāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3539: yadi guṇānāmādye prakope svasāmarthyādeva pūrvasmātpracyutistenottarakālamapi tadvadeva bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3540: atha pradhānāvasthāyāmapi copakāro na tarhi nānaikāntiko heturiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3543: tadyathā sūkṣmo 'gniḥ sūkṣmaṃ prakāśaṃ svayameva karoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:3569: anvayadarśanāttadanupapattiriti cet syānmatam pradhānānvaya eva pṛthivyādiṣu sukhādilakṣaṇa upalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3570: yacca yenānvitaṃ tasyāsau vikāra iti yuktametatprāgapadiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3582: kāraṇāntarapūrvakatve 'pi khalu vyaktasya śaktyāḥ parimāṇādayaḥ pūrvameva kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3586: astitve hi paramāṇūnāmabhyupagamyamāne sati satyamevaṃ syādiyamāśaṃkā,
GSP31yuktdipu:3590: yattu khalvidamucyate pṛthivyādiṣu rūpādyupalambhādanvayadarśanādaṇūnāṃ sadbhāvaḥ pradhānavadeva kalpayitavya ityetadapi cānupapannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3592: tanmātrapūrvakatve 'pi hi pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpyamāne rūpādisattvādato na yuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3594: athāpi syādyathā tanmātrāṇāṃ rūpādimattvaṃ kalpyate tatpūrvakatvaṃ ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ dṛśyamapi teṣu rūpādisattvaliṅgena paramāṇubhyo niṣkṛṣyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3600: āha, yadi punastanmātrāṇāmeva paramāṇutvamabhyupagamyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3604: kasmāt ? svakāryāddhi prathīyasī prakṛtirbhavatīti ca naḥ samayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3610: astu vā paramāṇūnāṃ sadbhāvastathāpi tebhyo jagadutpatterasambhavaṃ brūmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3615: tasmātsatyapi sadbhāve na teṣāṃ jagatkāraṇamiṣyate iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3617: yaddhi tatparamāṇūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeva jagatkāraṇatvena yuktaṃ kalpayituṃ syāt na tanniṣādimatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3618: kṛtakatvāsiddherayuktamiti cet syānmataṃ yadi paramāṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvaṃ prasiddhamata etadyujyate vaktumamuṣmāddhetorakāraṇaṃ paramāṇava iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3656: iha yayormadhye antarā dravyamavasthitam prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:3660: yo yaḥ prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ tau kṛtakau tasmāttāvapi kṛtakau /
GSP31yuktdipu:3671: ataeva kṛtakatvamiti cet syānmataṃ yata eva yogināṃ pratyakṣāḥ paramāṇavastata eva kṛtakāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3673: asmadādipratyakṣaṃ ghaṭādi hi kṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3683: yathā sattāguṇatvarūpatvādīnāṃ sati pratyakṣatve 'kṛtakatvam evaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3689: na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ sūkṣmataramanyad bhāvāntaramasti yadeṣāmārambhakaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3697: na ca yathā pradhānapuruṣāvevamaṇavo 'pi viśvaṃ vyaśnuvate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3700: yeṣāṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ pacyata iti pakṣasteṣāmayamanupālambha ityataḥ paramāṇusamavetaṃ karmodāhāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3701: taddhi sūkṣmamatīndriyaṃ kṛtakaṃ ceti siddhaṃ kṛtakāḥparamāṇavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3710: caitanyāviśeṣādīśvarasyāpi sa eva vidhiḥ kāraṇatvapratiṣedhe boddhavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3732: śaktimattvātsvata iti cet syātpunaretat sarvaśaktipracita īśvaraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3733: tasya prāgapi pradhānavipariṇāmātsvata evecchāyogād buddhisadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3745: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthamādāya pratibadhyamānena śaktiviśeṣaḥ smartavya ityetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3747: evaṃ svata īśvarasya buddhisambhavo na cedbhavet yuktamucyate prākpradhānapravṛtterbuddhyasambhavānna buddhimatpūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3749: dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā phalamuddiśya buddhimantaḥ kāryaviśeṣānprāsādavimānādīnārabhamāṇā dṛśyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3768: yadyapīśvarapūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ tathāpyādisarge sukhottarāṇāmasmadutpannānāṃ prāṇināṃ dharmādharmaparigrahād hīnamadhyamotkṛṣṭavayojātisvabhāvādiyogo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3775: yaduktaṃ sarvamīśvarabuddhipūrvakaṃ vyaktamiti tu tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3780: yo 'yaṃ cetanācetanayorgośakaṭayorabhisambandhaḥ sa kena cetanena kṛtaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3783: atha caitraśabdavācyasya piṇḍasyopadraṣṭā kṣetrajñaḥ tatkṛta iṣyate tadayuktam,
GSP31yuktdipu:3790: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti svābhāvika īśvarasya kāryakāraṇayorabhisambandha iṣyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3806_0: kāryakāraṇavattānabhyupagamādadoṣa iti cet vyāpī niravayavo 'nantaśaktiḥ sūkṣmebhyaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3810: itthaṃ cedīśvaro yadidamanumānaṃ kāryaviśeṣasyātiśayabuddhipūrvakatvācca cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvāditi tadvyāhanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3816: śrutirapi cāsya mūrtimācaṣṭe kṛttivāsāḥ pinākahasto vitatadhanvā nīlaśikhaṇḍītyādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:3820: kasmāt ? na hyasato mūrtimattvamupapadyata iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3823: na hyekāntena vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śaktiviśeṣaṃ pratyācakṣmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:3825: yathā tu bhavatocyate pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ tayoḥ prayoktā nāstītyayamasmadabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3829: kurvāṇaḥ khalvapyayamabhisambandhaṃ śarīramātreṇa vā śarīriṇaḥ kuryāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:3849: kasmāt ? dvividhaṃ hi dravyaṃ anekadravyamadravyaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3853: pṛthivyādīni manaḥparyantāni navaiva dravyāṇi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3856: sati cāsya dravyatve vaiśeṣikaguṇanirdeśa ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3867: pratyakṣapūrvakatvādvā saṃjñākarmaṇa ityetasmālliṅgādīśvaraparigraha ācāryasya siddha iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3870: satyamanena liṅgenāsmadādibhyo viśiṣṭaśakteḥ kasyacideva māhātmyaśarīrasyānyasya vā pratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3871: saṃjñāmātraṃ tu yathā bhavadbhiḥ sarvakāraṇānāṃ sṛṣṭyupasaṃhārapravṛttiheturekaḥ svatantra iṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3875: īśvaraparatantre cedaṇūnāṃ pravṛttinivṛttī syātāṃ tameva prāgupadiśet /
GSP31yuktdipu:3880: na cāsya vadhvā iva śvaśuranāmasaṃkīrtane doṣopapattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3890: yathāntareṇa śarīraṃ karma notpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamevamantareṇa karma śarīrasyāpi kāraṇāntaramaśakyaṃ kalpayitumiti parasparanimittatvānnāsya parivartasya pūrvakoṭiḥ prajñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3900: yadyadhikāranimittā śarīrotpattirādisarge 'bhyupagamyate prāptamekena śarīreṇa sarvapuruṣāṇāmabhisambandho niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3908: apavarganiyamaprasaṃga iti cet syānmataṃ yadyadhikāramātravaśāccharīrotpattiḥ paramarṣerevāpavargasādhanaṃ śarīrādutpadyeteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3910: kiṃ tarhi sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ prādhānyāttannimittāni śarīrāṇyādisarge sāṃsiddhikānyutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3911: tatra yasya sattvapradhānaṃ kāryakaraṇaṃ sa paramarṣiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3913: evaṃ guṇasamparkād guṇapradhānāpradhānabhāvena yāvatsthāvaraśarīraprādurbhāva ityato nāsti guṇānāṃ śarīraviniyogapakṣapātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3920: na hi naḥ kālo nāma kaścidasti,
GSP31yuktdipu:3924: yadeva kṛtakaṃ tatraiva paramaparamityādiḥ pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3926: kvacitsāmarthādapākajavadadoṣa iti cet syānmatam- yathāgnisaṃyogaḥ pākajahetuḥ tathā cāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyāmeva pākajotpattinimittaṃ bhavati nākāśādiṣu /
GSP31yuktdipu:3927: evaṃ kālo 'pi parāparādiheturatha cānityeṣveva syānna nityeṣviti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3934: evaṃ yadi kriyābhyo 'nyaḥ kāla iṣyate kāraṇaparispandasya jagatkāraṇatvamathānyatsādhyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3937: sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prekṣāpūrvakṛtānāṃ śayanādīnāmupalabdhau yādṛcchikeṣu cānupalabdhau na tasyā liṅgamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3940: na hi tata utpannānāṃ parimāṇamupapadyata ityato nāpyanvayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3961: yatraitacchakyate vaktuṃ trayaḥ sattvādaya iti tadavasthānaṃ kāryārambhakamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3963: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kāryakāle guṇāḥ parityaktapūrvāvasthā bhedaṃ pratilabhya parasparopakāreṇa saṃhanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3969: dvividhā hi kriyā praspandalakṣaṇā pariṇāmalakṣaṇā ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3973: āha- nanu ca pariṇāmo 'pi saukṣmyātpradhānasya nopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3974: kasmāt ? na hi saukṣmyātsūkṣmasyākāśādervipariṇāmo dṛṣṭa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3981: tattvādapracyuto dharmī pariṇāmaḥ sa ucyate // iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3982: yadā śaktyantarānugrahātpūrvadharmān tirobhāvya svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntareṇāvirbhavati tadavasthānamasmākaṃ pariṇāma ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3985: ucyate- yathā pālāśaṃ palāśādapracyutanimittāntarasyātapāderanugrahācchyāmatāṃ tirobhāvya pītatāṃ vrajati tathedaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3987: kathaṃ punaretavagamyate pālāśaṃ svarūpādapracyutaṃ dharmāntarasya parityāgamupādānaṃ ca karoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:3989: ucyate- kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhāt prāgeva kṣaṇabhaṅganirdiṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭānāṃ bhāvānāṃ punarutpattau nāsti kāraṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3993: tatra yadi dharmasya nivṛttirabhyupagamyate dharmiṇo 'pi nivṛttirananyatvātprāptā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4002: tatra yaduktaṃ dharmivināśe dharmavināśa iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4005: iha rūpādisāmānyaṃ vā dharmirūpatvena parikalpyamānaṃ parikalpyeta rūpādiviśeṣo vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4008: yadi tāvatpṛthivī sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣastena pṛthivyapi tanmātrāpekṣayā viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4012: tataśca yaduktaṃ svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntaraṃ vijahāti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4016: yattūktaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāntarāpekṣaṃ viśeṣatvamiti na pratyayanivṛttau sāmānyābhāvāvasthitestataśca dharmisvarūpasiddheḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4017: yāvatpṛthivītyayaṃ pratyayo na nivartate sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4020: yadā tu pṛthivīpratyayanivṛttistadā tanmātrāṇāṃ sāmānyabhāvo dravyatvaṃ ca viśeṣo dharma iti yāvatpradhānaṃ tasya tu sāmānyāntarānupapatteḥ kauṭasthyameva /
GSP31yuktdipu:4022: yadi tu pṛthivyādīnāṃ nityamavyāvṛtaṃ sati kauṭasthyameṣāṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4025: athavā sukhaduḥkhamohaśaktaya eveha mahadādinā viśeṣāntena liṅgena pariṇāmaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4026: tāsāṃ ca satataṃ sāmānyapratyayanimittatvātsvarūpādapracyute taddravyatvaṃ liṅgasya dharmatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4031: yadi sukhādiśaktaya eva pariṇāminyo yadidaṃ brahmādi sthāvarāntaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ tannopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4038: tathā guṇaśaktayo viśiṣṭāḥ parasparāśrayaviśeṣād brahmādi stambāntaṃ jātyākṛtivāgbuddhisvabhāvāhāravihārarūpaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4047: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvādityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4050: vijñānaskandhavyatirikto nāsti kaścidartha iti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4071: na dṛśyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām //
GSP31yuktdipu:4077: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pūrvavaccheṣavadbhyāṃ cātmano nopalabdhiriti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4091: yadi ca tairatideśaḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyate prāptamasya tadvatsaṃghātārthatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4101: sati hi saṃghātatve devadattādivadayaṃ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣata evopalabhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4102: tathā ca sati saṃśayābhāvātpravṛttirevāsya vādasya na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4109: tadyathā śayanādyaṅgānāṃ sati parasparopakāritve tato 'nyenārthavattvāttadabhāve cārthānarthakyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4110: evaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sati parasparopakāritve tato 'nyenārthavattvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4112: āha, śayanādīnāṃ devadattārthatvāttasya ca bhedā bahirbhāvātparasparārthatvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4125: prasiddhena hyaprasiddhaṃ taddharmatāmāpadyate bhavadbhirapyuktaṃ “yasya hi pratikṣaṇamanyathātvaṃ nāsti tasya bāhyapratyayayoḥ bhedaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4134: triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi ca bāhyādhyātmikaṃ tathā pradhānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4140: tasmādasti tadvyatirikto yadadhiṣṭhitānāṃ guṇānāmayaṃ citrarūpo vipariṇāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4147: yathāpuruṣārthaḥ siddhyati tathā guṇā kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyūhyanta ityatastatpāratantryādeṣāmadhiṣṭhitatvamupapadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4176: tattu khalvidamiṣyate rūpaṃ pratītya cakṣuścotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamityādi,
GSP31yuktdipu:4180: syānmataṃ nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yaduta yajjātīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tajjātīyakena kāryeṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4189: yathā satyetasminvilakṣaṇakāryaprādurbhāve bhavataścetanāccittānnācetanaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti niyamaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4190: tathā satyetasminvilakṣaṇakāryaprādurbhāve nācetanebhyo rūpādibhyaścetanaṃ cittamutpadyata ityayaṃ niyamo naḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4193: syādetat yathācetanebhyaḥ sattvādibhyo 'vyavasāyakaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti nedānīṃ vyavasāyako mahānnotpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4194: evaṃ rūpādibhyo 'cetanaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti nedānīṃ cetanaṃ cittaṃ notpadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4201: āha, kiṃ vyavasāyacaitanyayoḥ kaścidrūpabhedo 'sti na veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4202: ucyate- kiṃ tarhi traiguṇyātsati pratyayarūpatve saṃvedyā buddhiryathā tu vyavasāyarūpaṃ tathā caitanyarūpamiti /
