GSP31yuktdipu:4203: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- buddhivṛttyāviṣṭo hi pratyayatvenānuvartamānāmanuyāti puruṣa iti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:4206: yathā yathā manovṛttiḥ puruṣo 'sti tathā tathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4209: yadi tarhi yathā vyavasāyarūpaṃ tathā caitanyarūpam,
GSP31yuktdipu:4210: evaṃ sati vyavasāyamātraṃ parikalpanīyaṃ caitanyamātraṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4216: ucyate- ya evamāha rūpābhedādarthābheda iti sa tāvadidaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ- atha kim ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4220: na hi viṣayasya vijñānapratyavabhāsamantareṇa śakyaṃ svarūpaṃ paricchettum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4221: tatra yadanyākāro gauranyākāraṃ govijñānaṃ syāttena yathānyākāreṇāśvavijñānenānyākārasya goraparicchedaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4229: yathaiva tarhi bhavataḥ satyapyākārabhede jñānavijñeyayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaparikalpanādbheda evaṃ puruṣāntaḥkaraṇayorapīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4236: idānīṃ tu rūpābhede 'pi grāhyagrāhakabhāvādevaṃ bruvato mārgāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4244: itareṣāṃ tu jñānamātrasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratiṣetsyāma iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4250: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti puruṣo niścayarūpatvānna viṣayo na tarhyadhyavasāyādapi niśceturarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4257: yadyacetanā buddhistena tasyā adhyavasāyo vṛttirghaṭādivanna prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4263: apratibandhena diṅniścayādiṣu suptamattamūrcchitānāṃ ca vyavasāyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4266: yasya punarantaḥkaraṇaṃ vyavasāyakaṃ tasyaivaṃ doṣo nāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4270: tatra yadādhyavasāyalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ guṇābhāvātpradhānabhūtena tamasā tiraskṛtaśakti bhavati tadādhyavasāyapratibandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4289: yāvattasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛttirbhavatā puruṣāstitve liṅgamapadiśyate tadidamasiddhaṃ pradipādyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4293: sādhitaṃ tu pradhānaṃ parimāṇādibhirityato na kiṃcidetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4295: yadi puruṣasya sattvameva syāttena taṃ pratyācāryāṇāṃ na dharmavivādaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4315: tatra yuktaṃ sarvapramāṇānupalabdhernāsti puruṣa iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4317: yatpunaretaduktaṃ “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyata” iti satyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4318: na hi puruṣaskandhānāṃ nikṣepe pratisaṃdhāne 'nyatra vā kāraka iti naḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4331: ayamapi cātmā kāryakāraṇasambandhītyataḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śrotrādivadanekaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4338: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ sambandhitvādātmapadārthe sandehaḥ kimaneko 'thaika iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4339: atra brūmaḥ- bahavaḥ puruṣā iti pratijñā / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4341: janmeti mahadādeḥ sūkṣmaśarīrāśritasya liṅgasya yathāsaṃskāraṃ bāhyena śarīreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4342: maraṇamiti pūrvakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalabhogaparisamāpteḥ sāmpratasya ca phalabhogasya pratyupasthāne liṅgasya pūrvaśarīratyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4344: janma ca maraṇaṃ ca karaṇāni ca janmamaraṇakaraṇāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:4347: etaduktaṃ bhavati- janmalakṣaṇaṃ ca maraṇalakṣaṇaṃ ca kāryakāraṇasyāvasthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4349: tatra yadyeka ātmā syāt tena yathaikaṃ dravyaṃ tamaḥprakāśāvekapradeśopanipātinau na śaknotyanubhavitumasambhavāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:4356: na hi śakyamekenātmanā prakāśātiśayo viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇo 'śuddhyatiśayaścāśaktilakṣaṇo virodhitvādyugapadupabhoktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4368: śaktaścāsau yugapadanekāni śarīrāṇi upabhoktumityato yāvadbhiḥ śarīrairapacitāsu kālamātrāsvasminbhavaparivarte bhavitavyaṃ sarveṣāmutpattiṃ prati yugapatpravarteta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4372: katham ? yadyeka ātmā syāttena tatsaṃskāropanibaddhānyeva sarvāṇi karaṇānītyataḥ pratipaṇḍitamavasthitaiḥ karaṇairyugapadviṣayāngṛhṇīyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4373: bādhiryādyupaghāte vā sati piṇḍāntarasambandhinā karaṇenāsya śabdādikaraṇamapratiṣiddhaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4382: iha triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmītyete dharmāḥ pratipiṇḍamupalabhyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4383: yathā caite tathā tatpratiyogino nairguṇyādayaḥ puruṣadharmāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4401: ucyate- yathā hi kriyāsākṣiṇi kasmiṃścidavasthite kartā tadicchānuvidhāyī kāryaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:4408: na yathā sattvādīnāṃ paraspareṇa prakāśādidharmāpekṣāṇāṃ saṃsargaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4410: mādhyasthyamityanenātiśayanihrāsānupapatteḥ puruṣasya guṇaiḥ saha bādhānugrahānupapattiṃ svakāryapravṛttau cāpakṣapātaṃ darśayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4414: na ca sattvādīnāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇairdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa pravartamānānāṃ svena caitanyalakṣaṇena dharmeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4416: evaṃ saha guṇaiḥ kāryaṃ na kurute strīkumāravat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4422: tadevamanena sūtreṇācāryaḥ puruṣasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ nairguṇyamaudāsīnyaṃ bhoktṛtvamakartṛtvaṃ ca sādhyatāmāpādya triguṇayādiviparyayaṃ sādhanatvenopanyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4423: taiḥ pañcabhistriguṇādiviparītaiḥ karmabhiḥ pañcānāmeṣāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pravṛttiravagantavyā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4428: yadyasya sukhādidharmatvamātmanaḥ prasiddhaṃ syādata etadyujjate vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4432: ātmaguṇāḥ sukhādayo na śabdaguṇā ityatrāpi bhavatā viśeṣo nābhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4439: tadyathā gauraḥ kṛṣṇo 'hamiti śarīradharmerātmano bhinnādhikaraṇatvamahaṅkāreṇa evaṃ sukhaduḥkhayorapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4442: yadyapi gaurādīnāmavibhaktamahaṃkāreṇa grahaṇaṃ tathāpi pṛthagayaṃ prāgetānātmano gṛhītvā paścādavibhaktāngṛhṇanśaktnoti vyavasthāpayitumuṣyaite na punaramuṣyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4448: idānīṃ tu satyapi tasminpṛthaggrahaṇādabhāvaṃ bruvato mārgāntaragamanamanaikāntikasya cāparihāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4450: yata eva gaurādayaḥ pṛthagupalabhyante na sukhādayo eva saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4451: na ca yata eva saṃśayastata eva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4456: yathāgniḥ pākajanimittamupādīyate 'tha caiṣāṃ pārthivatvamevaṃ śabdādayo 'pi sukhādinimittatvenopādīyeran atha caiṣāmātmaguṇatvameva syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4459: yathā nimittasyāgnerna pākajaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pakvo 'gniḥ pacyate 'gniriti evaṃ śabdādīnāṃ nimittatvānna sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4462: āha, evamapi sukhādīnāṃ śabdādyātmabhāvo na yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4464: yathā hi śabdāḥ śabdātmakā eti sarvaiḥ śabdarūpeṇa gṛhyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:4479: ātmaguṇākāṃkṣitvādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam nimittapradhānatvādanyaparipākavaśena sukhaduḥkhenotpādayatyātmanaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4480: tanmayatve tu nirākāṃkṣatvātpradhānasya vyavasthābhedo na yukta iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4491: puruṣaguṇatve tu pākajavannimittādutpannānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ viśeṣabhāvāttīvramandatānupapattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4503: yathā hyaṇuḥ śyāmatāṃ parityajya rūpaviśeṣameva raktalakṣaṇamupādatte,
GSP31yuktdipu:4507: tathā ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kasyāṃcidavasthāyāmaśabdakaṃ bhavatītyasmānprati sādhyo 'yamarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4508: bheryādiśabdāstu tadguṇa eveti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmātsukhaduḥkhayoḥ śabdādyātmabhāvo 'yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4511: tasmādyuktametannirguṇa ātmā nairguṇyācca sākṣimātra iti kevalo viviktatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4512: tasmādayaṃ guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaḥ tasmātkevalaḥ na taiḥ saha saṃsargeṇa vartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4513: āha, kaḥ punarasyātmano guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhāvo 'bhipreta iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4515: na hi sattvādayaḥ prakāśādibhirdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa vartamānāḥ puruṣakṛtamupakāramapekṣante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4517: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti “pradhānapravṛttirapratyayā puruṣeṇāparigṛhyamāṇādisarge vartante” iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4535: na cācetanānāṃ draṣṭṛtvamupapadyate ityataḥ puruṣa eva caitanyād dṛṣṭā nānyattattvāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4551: yathā vibhutve sati pradhānasya sakriyatvamevaṃ puruṣasya iti vibhutve sakriyatvena bhavitavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4557: evaṃ niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ niṣkriyatvācca pradhānātkāryakāraṇaṃ na kurute /
GSP31yuktdipu:4564: pūrvasmādeva hetoḥ athāpi syātsvataḥ puruṣaḥ kāryakaraṇaṃ kuruta iti tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4569: syātpunaretat avyapadiśya yoniṃ puruṣo 'bhidhyānamātreṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ kurute ityasadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4577: nādhyavasāyaṃ kurute puruṣo naivaṃ sthitiṃ prayogaṃ vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4578: na svātmano na parato na vyapadeśānna cobhayataḥ //
GSP31yuktdipu:4589: guṇakartṛtve ca tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4601: yadi cetanasaṃyogād buddhyādīnāṃ pratyayavadupacāraḥ vyāpitvādasya ghaṭādibhirapi saṃyogo na pratiṣidhyata ityataḥ prāptasteṣāmapi pratyayavadupacāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4606: yathopadhānasaṃyogaviśeṣe satyākāśasphaṭikayoḥ sphāṭikamevopadhanasarūpaṃ pratyavabhāsate śaktito nākāśam,
GSP31yuktdipu:4607: evaṃ puruṣasaṃyogāviśeṣe buddhighaṭayoḥ śaktito buddhireva cetanārūpāpannevopalabhyate, na ghaṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4610: yadi tarhi karaṇasambandhātpuruṣaḥ kartṛtvopacāraṃ viṣayasarūpatāṃ ca pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4618: ata evāsya satyāṃ cetanāśaktau vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4621: na hyasya nityatvātkiṃcidanugrahāya nāpaghātāya / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:4637: puruṣasya hi guṇānāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ parikalpyamāno 'nyatarakarmajo vā parikalpyate yathā sthāṇuśyenayoḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4646: yathāgneḥ svābhāvikādauṣṇyānmokṣo na bhavati evamātmanaḥ svābhāvikatvādguṇasaṃyogādanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4650: svasvāmiśaktinimitte hi saṃyoge parikalpyamāne śaktyoḥ satatāvasthānādanirmokṣa eva prasajyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4654: tasyā eva tu pravṛtte puruṣārthamapohya nimittāntaraṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4656: tasmādayuktaṃ puruṣasya guṇānāṃ ca yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4660: yadi ca yādṛcchiko guṇapuruṣasaṃyogaḥ syāttasyājñānānnivṛttirnāstīti tadarthasyābhyutthānasyānarthakyaṃ prāptaṃ viśeṣānupapatteśca kāraṇāntaraṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4664: satatameva hi puruṣasya viṣayitvamavyāvṛttaṃ guṇānāṃ ca viṣayatvamityanirmokṣaprasaṃga eva syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4672: yatrāsau na saṃbhavati tatra sannidhimātrasāmānyād bhaktyā kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4684: ayaṃ tvanyo 'rthanimittaḥ śāstrīyaḥ saṃyogo bhavatā paribhāṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4692: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sannidhānāviśeṣe sati ātmana ākāśādeśca yasmāddṛkchaktiyuktaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmātkāryakāraṇatāmāpannena pradhānena saha bhoktṛtvena saṃbadhyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4695: yathā tṛptyarthā bhujikriyā tṛptyau satyāṃ nivartate prāptyarthā gamikriyā prāptau satyām,
GSP31yuktdipu:4696: evaṃ puruṣasya pradhānena darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ darśane sati nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4697: tathā ca vakṣyati dṛṣṭā mayetiyupekṣaka eko dṛṣṭāhamityuparataiketi (ISk 66) /
GSP31yuktdipu:4701: ucyate yadyapyetadevaṃ tathāpi yathā puruṣasya darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4705: satyapi hi darśanāviśeṣe pradhānaṃ puruṣasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4706: yadāsya buddhistamaso 'ṅgitvādye guṇāḥ kāryarūpāpannāḥ śiraḥpāṇyādaya ādhyātmikā,
GSP31yuktdipu:4710_0: yadā tvanye guṇāḥ prakṛtibhūtā vikārabhūtāḥ kāryabhūtāḥ kāraṇabhūtā acetanāḥ parārthā
GSP31yuktdipu:4710_1: anyo 'haṃ na prakṛtirna vikṛtirna kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ nācetanaḥ svārtha iti bhinnapratyayopasaṃhāraṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:4711: so 'yaṃ puruṣasya dṛkchaktinimittaḥ pradhānasya ca kaivalyāvadhiparicchinnaḥ puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4716: tadyathā agnerdahanaṃ paraśośchedanamasati dāhye chedye na vyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4719: tathā pradhānamapyantareṇa puruṣopakāraṃ svakādasarmarthamaniṣpannakāryasamaṃ cetitamanarthakama syādityataḥ puruṣamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4722: yathā paṅgurnāntareṇāndhaṃ dṛkchaktyā viśiṣṭenārthenārthavānbhavati andhaśca nāntareṇa paṅguṃ viśiṣṭenārthena,
GSP31yuktdipu:4723: evaṃ pradhānaṃ nāntareṇa puruṣaṃ kṛtamapi kāryaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktamanavadhikaṃ ca pravartamānaṃ viśeṣābhāvānnaiva nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4724: tathā puruṣaḥ satyapi cetanatve nāntareṇa pradhānamupalabhyābhāvādupalabdhā bhavediti pradhānamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4726: vinā sargeṇa bandho hi puruṣasya na yujyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4729: kasmāt ? na hyasau vinā sargeṇa na yujyata iti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:4739: sā cāpekṣā puruṣānantyānna nivartata ityato 'rthavatīnāṃ hi prakṛtīnāṃ tadaparisamāpterna nivṛtirasti // 21 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4740: // iti śrīyuktidīpikāyāṃ saptatipaddhatau pañcamamāhnikaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca prakaraṇam // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:4744: evaṃ kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhātprakṛteḥ puruṣārtho 'yaṃ vyaktabhāvena vipariṇāma iti sthitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4749: tadanyeṣāṃ purāṇetihāsapraṇetḥṇāṃ mahato 'haṃkāro vidyata iti pakṣaḥ- mahato 'smipratyayakartṛtvābhyupagamāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4751: mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti vindhyavāsimatam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4766: prākṛtavaikṛtikāni tu jñānāni prerakāṅgasaṃgṛhītāni pradhānādāgacchanti ceti pañcādhikaraṇaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4773: evamanekaniścayeṣvācāryeṣu ye tāvatpradhānamahatorantarāle tattvāntaramicchanti tatpratikṣepāyācāryaḥ svamatamupanyasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4779: anyasya tu pakṣe naivāhaṃkāro vidyata iti pratiṣedhavivakṣayedamāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:4783: mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti tannirāsārthamāha
GSP31yuktdipu:4788: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4789: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakādgaṇādyaḥ pañcako gaṇastataḥ pañca mahābhūtānyutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4791: bhūtasaṃjñā hi tanmātrāṇāṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmatra tu sāṃkhyācāryāṇāmavipratipattiḥ bhūtakauṭasthyavādinastu mīmāṃsakā ārhatāśca /
GSP31yuktdipu:4801: puruṣa evāyamiti yaḥ pratyayo niścayo 'rthagrahaṇaṃ so 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4807: abhivyakteradoṣa iti cetsyādetannendriyasannidhānādibhirarthagrahaṇaṃ janyate kiṃ tarhyabhivyajyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4810: sā hyabhivyaktiḥ svarūpalābho vā syāt grahaṇapratibandhavyudāso vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4811: kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvatsvarūpalābhaḥ kriyate 'rthagrahaṇamiti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4825: sādhyaṃ caitat kiṃ tadeva mṛddravyaṃ ghaṭādivṛttibhedamanubhavati āhosvitpratyayāntaravaśādanyaccānyaccotpadyate iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4827: upetya vānuvṛttiṃ brūmaḥ- na hi tadekaṃ mṛddravyam,
GSP31yuktdipu:4834: parimāṇādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam sattvādīnāmaṅgāṅgibhāvaniyamāttena tenārthagrahaṇātmanā vipariṇāmo vṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4839: atha nāśotpādau tena dharmadharmiṇorananyatvāddharmāṇāṃ nāśotpādādbuddherapi nāśotpādaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4856: kasyātra vipratipattiranityā vā buddhiḥ syānnityā veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4863: tasmādanitye satyapi viśeṣānabhidhāne kṣaṇikatvamevānena hetunā buddheḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4870: svakāraṇapariniṣpannāyā hi buddhervyāpāro 'rthagrahaṇasaṃjñaka indriyādisannidhānāpekṣo na buddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4878: tathāpyuparatavyāpārasyāpi paraśvādervṛttimataḥ svarūpa noparamatīti bhedamupacarya vyavahāro nānākāryaviṣayaḥ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4885: so 'pi vṛttiviṣaya iti kṛtvā tadapyuktamindriyādibhede bhedāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4891: udakasyānanasaṃyogāddravyāntarameva pratibimbalakṣaṇamutpadyate na tu mukhaṃ bhidyate iti asadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4897: kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhe coktaṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmanyathā cānyathā cotpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4898: yatpunaretaduktaṃ naikaṃ mṛddravyamiti tatra buddhiḥ pramāṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4900: tatra yadi mṛdo 'nekatvena prayojanaṃ buddhirupalabhyate- vayamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4902: mṛddravyasya saṃsthānavyatirekeṇa svabhāvo 'vadhāryate na tu buddherarthagrahaṇamantareṇa svarūpagrahaṇamiti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4907: yathā bāhyārthākāravaccittasantatiratha ca suptamūrchitavirodhasamāpannānāmartharūpādṛte bījamātrāstītyupagamyate sā citi kāpi vāvastheti vacanāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:4908: na ca gṛhyate tathā buddhirapīti kasmānna parikalpyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4909: yatpunaretaduktam yadi dharmāntaropādānaparityāgau vyaktavyaktī dattottara eṣa pakṣa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4911: asmābhirapi tarhyasatkāryapratyākhyāne dattottara eṣa pakṣo vyaktitarna kriyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4912: nāśotpādau tu aniṣṭāveveti na parihāraṃ pratyādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4917: bhavata eva naṣṭotpannebhyaḥ skandhebhyo nānyā santatiratha ca nāsti doṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4918: kayāpi yuktayā syādetadanyaivāsāviti tataścaikā santatiriti hīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4921: sattvaṃ hi prakarṣamanubhavadrajastamasī ca nyūnatāṃ dharmādirūpāṃ buddherāpyāyanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4923: evaṃ rahastamo vā prakarṣamanubhavatsattvaṃ ca nyūnatādharmādirūpaṃ buddherāpyāyanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4928: atra brūmaḥ- grahaṇānyatve coktaṃ vṛttibhedo na vṛttimadbhedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4931: upetya vā brūmaḥ- yadi pratyarthamanyadanyadgrahaṇaṃ kalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4933: tathā kalmāṣaṃ śabalaṃ citramityanekārtharūpamekaṃ grahaṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4937: buddhestu triguṇātmakatvāttasya guṇasya prakarṣe tattadrūpāntaramutpadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4938: āha, kasya guṇasya prakarṣe buddheḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ rūpāntaramupajāyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4942: atra tvetadrūpamiti satyapi dharmādibhede buddhirityabhedavivakṣāviṣaya ekavacananirdeśaḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4943: etaduktaṃ bhavati yadā rajastamasī vaśamāpādya buddhigataṃ sattvamutkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadā dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryamityetadrūpaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4944: tatra śrutismṛtivihitānāṃ karmaṇāmanuṣṭhānādbuddhyavasthaḥ sattvāvayava āśayabhūto dharma ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4949: akrodho guruśuśrūṣā śaucamāhāralāghavamapramāda iti pañca niyamāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4959: abhyāsajaṃ punaḥ vairāgyapūrvāvajayapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ śāntamamalaṃ dhruvaṃ sakalabhavābhavapratipakṣabhūtam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4965: tatrendriyāṇāṃ viṣayābhilāṣalakṣaṇakaṣāyapācanaṃ prati yaḥ prayatna utsāhaḥ sā yatamānasaṃjñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4967: yadā tu keṣāṃcidindriyāṇāṃ paripakvaṃ sā vyatirekasaṃjñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4968: vyatiricyante hi tadā yaterindriyāṇi paripakvāṇyaparipakvebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇi bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4970: nivṛttasarvendriyaviṣayecchasya yaterekameva manolakṣaṇamindriyaṃ tadā paripakvaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4972: saṃkalpamūlocchinnaviṣayamṛgatṛṣṇo hi ayaṃ yatirindriyāṇāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca pravṛttinivṛttyorīṣṭe /
GSP31yuktdipu:4975: tadevaṃ caturavasthaṃ vairāgyaparva vijñāya tadanuṣṭhānāya yatiḥ prayateta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4976: tasyopāyo dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayapratyākhyāne ya upadiṣṭo yaśca tuṣṭiṣu vakṣyamāṇastamekīkṛtyottarottarāṃ tattvabhūmiṃ vijñānasya viṣayīkurvanpūrvasyāṃ tattvabhūmau madhyasthaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4978: yatpunaraṣṭavidhaṃ aṇimā mahimā laghimā garimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4989: śāstracoditasya nityasya ca karmaṇo 'nuṣṭhānād buddhyavasthastamo 'vayava āśayatāṃ pratipanno 'dharmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4992: yathā ca jñānaṃ dvividhaṃ śabdādyupalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ caivamajñānamapi viparyayeṇa vācyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4993: yathā ca caturavasthaṃ vairāgyaṃ tathā yatamānādikaścaturavastho rāgaḥ yathā cāṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryamaṇimādi tathāṣṭaguṇamanaiśvaryamevametattāmasaṃ mahato rūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4998: yasmādaśuddhireva prakāśamalamatipravṛttaṃ nivartayituṃ prakarṣāpannānyābhūtā ca pravartayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:5004: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmādidameva tāvaducyatāṃ kimasyāhaṅkārasya lakṣaṇamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5007: kartuḥ svātmapratyavamarśātmako yo 'yamahamiti pratyaya utpadyate sa khalvahaṃkāraḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5012: kasmāt ? prakṛtivikārayorananyatvābhyupagamāt na hi naḥ prakṛterarthāntarabhūto vikāra iti prāgvistareṇa pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5019: tathā ca śāstramāha “etasmāddhi mahata ātmana ime traya ātmānaḥ sṛjyante vaikārikataijasabhūtādayo 'haṃkāralakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5035: abhedavivakṣāyāṃ hi kṛtvā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇamevamasmābhirupadiṣṭaṃ dvividhaḥ sarga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5042: asya tu ṣoḍaśakasya vikārasya saṃjñālakṣaṇaprayojanānyuttaratra vakṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5044: yasyāmasmipratyayasya viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ bhavati- śabde 'haṃ sparśe 'haṃ rūpe 'haṃ rase 'haṃ gandhe 'hamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5050: na hi tattvāntarasanniveśināṃ sattvādīnāṃ saṃjñāntarābhidhāne kiṃcitprayojanamastīti,
GSP31yuktdipu:5059: mahadādilakṣaṇānāṃ hi guṇānāmanekarūpastattvārambha iti hi na saṃjñāntaramārabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5061: dharmādiviśeṣābhyupāmānmahati prasaṃga iti cet na viśeṣitatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5063: na tu dharmādayastattvāntaramato na mahati prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5065: kaḥ punaratra viśeṣo yena dharmādi na tattvāntaram,
GSP31yuktdipu:5076: āha, yadyevamidaṃ tarhi vaktavyamuṣya kāryaviśeṣasyaivaṃ saṃjñakādahaṃkārātpravṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5093: tadyadi sattvaṃ vaikārikaśabdenocyate vaikārikāṇi caindriya ekādaśakaḥ sargaḥ pravartata ityukte gamyata etat sāttviko 'sau,
GSP31yuktdipu:5094: bhūtādestānmātra ityukte gamyata etat tāmasa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5095: kasmāt ? na hyasti sambhavo yatsattvāttamobahulaḥ sargaḥ syāttamasaśca sattvabahula iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5101: aprasiddhārthā hi tāntrikī paribhāṣeyamanirṇītā na gamyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5108: katham ? yadā hi vaikāriko 'haṅkāra indriyabhāvena pravartate tadā niṣkriyatvāttaijasaṃ pravartakatvenākāṃkṣati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5112: āpo vāpsu prakṣiptā āpa eva bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:5113: evaṃ sattvameva sattve tu bhedaṃ janayati guṇāntarasaṃsargamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5114: bhūtādilakṣaṇasya tu tamasaḥ saṃsargād bhidyamānaṃ taijasena ca rajasā kriyātmakenānugṛhītamekādaśendriyabhāvamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5115: tathā bhūtādilakṣaṇaṃ tamo 'haṅkārāttanmātrabhāvena pravartamānaṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ taijasamākāṃkṣati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5118: śāsraṃ caivamāha- “tadetasminvaikārike strakṣyamāṇa eṣa bhūtādistaijasenopaṣṭabdha evaṃ vaikārikamabhidhāvati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5119: tathaiva tasminbhūtādau srakṣyamāṇe eṣa bhūtādistaijasenoṣṭabdha etaṃ bhūtādimabhibhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5124: āha, prāgapadiṣṭa aindriya ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtādahaṃkārāditi,
GSP31yuktdipu:5131: karṇau tvakcakṣuṣī ca rasanaṃ ca nāsikā ca karṇatvakcakṣūrasananāsikāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5146: vākca pāṇī ca pādau pāyuścopasthaśca vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5163: yasmād bhautikeṣvanyeṣu ghaṭādiṣu viṣayagrahaṇasāmarthyāsambhavaḥ āhaṃkāravikāravattatsāmarthyāpratiṣedhānnendriyāṇāṃ nastatpratiṣedho 'numātavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5179: yadi ca bhautikānīndriyāṇi na syuḥ naiṣāṃ bhautikairañjanādibhiranugrahaḥ kriyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5187: vaiśeṣikaguṇavyañjakatvādvikārapratītiriti cet atha matam- pṛthivyādivaiśeṣiko gandho ghrāṇenābhivyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5192: yena ca yasya vaiśeṣikaguṇābhivyaktistasya tadvikāratvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5217: apohya hi manaḥ saṃkalpaṃ vyastānāmindriyāntarāṇāṃ bhavānparikalpayet samastānāṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5228: yadi samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syātprāṇādivaditi cet syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:5231: evaṃ samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syānna cānyataravaikalye tadabhāvaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5245: mano na kevalaṃ buddhīndriyamapi tu karmendriyamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5252: iha yasyāntastriṣu ca kāleṣu karaṇasya vṛttistadubhayapracāram,
GSP31yuktdipu:5270: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmāducyatāṃ tasya karaṇasya kasminnarthe vṛttiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5272: ucyate- yaduktaṃ tasya kasminnarthe vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5274: rūpādiṣu śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu svabhedabhinneṣu pañcānāṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇānāṃ śravaṇasparśanadarśanarasanaghrāṇalakṣaṇo vyāpāro vṛttirityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5275: tatra karaṇanirdeśe śrotrendriyasya prākpāṭhāttadviṣayanirdeśātilaṃghane prayojanaṃ nāstīti kṛtvā śabdādiṣu pañcānāmityeva paṭhitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5280: tadyathā bhaikṣamātramasmingrāme labhyata ityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti jñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5282: evamālocanamātramindriyāṇāmiṣyate vṛttirityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5284: yaduktamanyairācāryaiḥ sāmānyajñānamindriyāṇāṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ buddheriti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5285: āha, kaḥ punarasmindarśane doṣo yata etatpratiṣidyata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5287_0: yadi khalvindriyasya sāmānyajñānaṃ na syāttena viśeṣāpekṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāpekṣaśca
GSP31yuktdipu:5287_1: viśeṣa iti yatra sāmānyajñānaṃ tatra viśeṣajñānamapi na pratiṣidhyata ityubhayamapīndriyasya syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5289: viśeṣavato vāntaḥkaraṇasya kaḥ sāmānyena virodha ityubhayasyāpi tatra sambhavādindriyānarthakyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5295: indriyasya cetpratyayaḥ syādyathā pratyayavato 'ntaḥkaraṇasya trikālaviṣayatvamevamasyāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5303: yadi pradīpavadindriyaṃ prakāśakaṃ syāttena yathā tatprakāśiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvartheṣu karaṇāntaramārgaṇamevamatrāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5306: antaḥkaraṇasadbhāvādayuktamiti cet syānmatam- asti kāraṇāntaraṃ buddhilakṣaṇaṃ yadindriyeṇa pradīpavatprakāśitamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5324: tathā viṣayendriyavṛttyanukāreṇa niścayo gaurayaṃ śuklo dhāvatītyevamādiḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5326: grahaṇasyānubhavāttu saṃskārādhānaṃ tatpūrvikā ca smṛtiriti trikālaviṣayā pratyayasyetyayamanayorviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5328: saṃskārāttu ghaṭādīnāṃ vyavadhānarūpaṃ pārthivaṃ chāyālakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvāya kalpate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5334: atha karmendriyāṇāṃ kā vṛttirityucyate- naiyāyikāstvevamāhuḥ- ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇīndriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5335: bhūtebhya ityanena svaviṣayopalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ hīndriyāṇāṃ bhūtaprakṛtitve sati nirvahati (?) nānyathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5337: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇi pañcendriyāṇi bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5341: evaṃ bhautikānīndriyāṇi svasvaviṣayamadhigantumutsahanta iti tallakṣaṇatvameṣāṃ sidhyatīti,
GSP31yuktdipu:5344: evaṃ hi sāṃkhyavṛddhā āhuḥ- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi arthaṃ sādhayitumarhanti nānyathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5345: tathā hi kārakaṃ kārakatvādeva prāpyakāri bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5346: bhautikāni cendriyāṇi kathaṃ prāpyakārīṇi duravartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5348: viṣayākārapariṇāmātmikā vṛttirvṛttimato 'nanyā satī sambhavatyeveti suvacaṃ prāpyakāritvam api ca mahadaṇuguṇagrahaṇamāhaṅkāritve teṣāṃ kalpate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5350: bhautikatve hi yatparimāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ tatparimāṇaṃ grāhyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5354: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthānāṃ tu vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandalakṣaṇā yathākramaṃ vṛttayaḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5356: tasmādya evārthapratyāyanasamartho varṇasamudāyaḥ padavākyaślokagranthalakṣaṇaḥ sa vāgindriyasyārtho nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5359: tataśca yadeva prakṣālanaparimārjanopasparśanādhyayanapraharaṇaśilpavyāyāmādi kṛtsnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa indriyārthā nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5364: ataśca ya evāśitapītavipariṇāmasya samyakstrotomārgānusāriṇo visargaḥ sa indriyārtho nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5377: tathā ca vakṣyati- dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiriti (ISk 30) /
GSP31yuktdipu:5378: tasmātsargakrameṇa vinā tannirdeśaḥ prāgācāryeṇa kriyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5381: śāstraṃ hyevamāha- kā nu bhoḥ saṃjñā māturudare 'vasthitaṃ kumāraṃ pratyabhinirviśata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5392: athavā naiva vayamidaṃ praṣṭavyā yathā prāgantaḥkaraṇavṛttinirdeśaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5398: yathā buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ hi saukṣmyānna śakyaṃ svarūpamabhidhātumityato vṛttireva lakṣaṇabhāvenopadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5405: tadeva vṛttitvenācakṣāṇaḥ śrotrādīnāmeva cābhidadhānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cāpyācakṣāṇo vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvaṃ jñāpayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5406: anyathā tu yathādhyavasāyādi lakṣaṇamevaṃ rūpādiṣu pañcānāmalocanamātraṃ lakṣaṇamityucyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5410: tasmādanyathā nirdeśo jñāpakaṃ vṛttivṛttimatoranyatvasyeti vyākhyātā karaṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5413: eṣeti sarvanāmnā pratyākṛṣṭāṃ tāmeva pratyakṣaṃ prati nirdiśati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5419: yā hīyamanukrāntā karaṇaparvaṇo 'dhyavasayādikā vṛttiriyaṃ vyastānāṃ karaṇānāṃ pratisvaṃ niyatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5421: āha, sāmānyaviśeṣayoritaretarāpekṣatvādasāmānyābhidhānena sāmānyasyāpyabhidhānādadhyavasāyādikā karaṇānāmasāmānyā vṛttirityukte 'rthādāpannameṣāṃ sāmānyāpi vṛttirastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5428: taiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaḥ prāṇa iti vedānteṣvapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5432: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya vyāpāro bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5436: kiṃ tu sāmānyakaraṇavṛttyā preryamāṇo vāyustatpravaṇatvāttatkāryatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5437: tatra prāṇādikārye vāyau prāṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā evamucyate- prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5439: kathametadavagamyate 'rthāntarapreritasya vāyoriyaṃ kriyā bhavati na punaḥ svatantrasyeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5445: kasmāt ? sarvatra prasaṃgāt svābhāvike hi vāyordiksaṃcāre 'bhyupagamyamāne sarvatra tatsaṃbhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5459: sa cāyaṃ vāyureka eva sthānasaṃcāraviśeṣānnānākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5460: yathaiko devadattaḥ pācako lāvaka iti kvacit /
GSP31yuktdipu:5470: yo 'yaṃ mukhanāsikābhyāṃ sañcarati so 'ntarvṛttirvāyuḥ prāṇa ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5471: yā kācitpraṇatirnāma bhūteṣu tadyathā praṇateyaṃ senā,
GSP31yuktdipu:5480: tadyathā mahatā vā duḥkhenābhiplutasya mahatā vā bandhunā viyuktasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:5484: yo 'yaṃ rasaṃ dhātūn śukraṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vātārtavagarbhāṃścākarṣannadhogacchannayamantarvṛttirvāyurapāna ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5485: yaccāpi kiṃcidapakramaṇaṃ nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā apakrānto 'yaṃ dharmādibhyastadviparītebhyo vā iti bāhyā khalvapānavṛttireṣā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5488: eṣā hyetaṃ prāṇamūrdhvaṃ vartamānamarvāgeva sanniyacchati arvāgeva sanniruṇaddhi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5492: yastvayaṃ prāṇāpānayormadhye hṛdyavatiṣṭhate sa samāno vāyurantarvṛttiḥ yaścāpi kaścitsaha bhāvo nāma bhūteṣu dvandvārāmatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5495: saha tapaścariṣyāmi saha bhāryāputrairbandhubhiḥ suhṛdbhiśca vartiṣya bāhyā samānavṛttireṣā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5498: eṣa hyetau prāṇāpānau ūrdhvamarvākca vartamānau madhya eva sanniyacchati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5504: prāṇānte sarvaprāṇināṃ prāṇāpānāvutsṛjyordhvamadhaśca muktayoktrau hayāviva viṣamaṃ saṃcārayan śarīraṃ sa parāsyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5506_0: yastvayaṃ prāṇāpānasamānānāṃ sthānānyatikramya rasaṃ dhātūṃścādāya mūrdhānamārohati
GSP31yuktdipu:5507: yaścāpi kaścidātmotkarṣo nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā hīnādasmi śreyān,
GSP31yuktdipu:5518: sa caiṣo 'trābhivyakto bhavati śītodakena vā paryukṣitasya prāsamasiṃ vikośaṃ codyatamabhipaśyataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5520: yastvayamālomanakhāccharīraṃ vyāpya rasādīnāṃ dhātūnāṃ pṛthivyādināṃ vyūhaṃ marmaṇāṃ ca praspandanaṃ prāṇādīnāṃ ca sthitiṃ karoti so 'ntarvṛttirvyānaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5521_0: yaścāpi kaścidatyantāvinābhāvo nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā pativratā bhartāraṃ mṛtamapyanugacchati
GSP31yuktdipu:5521_1: bhavāntare 'pyayameva bhartā syāt tathā dharmādibhistadviparītaiśceti bāhyo vyānaviṣaya evaiṣa prabhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5523: katham ? anena hi vyāpte śarīradaṇḍake tadvaśīkṛtānāṃ prāṇādīnāṃ samā sthitirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5525: tadyathā hā tarhi pādau haimau śītībhūtau gulphe jaṅghe urū kaṭirudaramuraḥkaṇṭhe 'sya khuraghuro vartate hū(?)
GSP31yuktdipu:5527: evamete prāṇādyāḥ sthānakāryaviśeṣasūcitāḥ pañca vāyavo vyākhyātāḥ teṣāṃ prerikā sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5529: sa ca dharmādisaṃskārabhāvanāvaśādanuparato jīvanam / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5532: sā yāvadaniruddhā tu hanti vāyuṃ rajo 'dhikā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5553: tadetatprāṇāṣṭamaṃ vaikārikaṃ guṇaśarīrasya paridraṣṭuḥ kṣetrajñasya śarīramādadānasya nityaṃ stambhasthānīyaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5555: anityāni punarbhautikāni bāhyāni kuśamṛttikāsthānīyāni upacīyante ceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5556: āha, kutaḥ punariyaṃ prāṇādivṛttiḥ pravartata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5558: mahataḥ pracyutaṃ hi rajo vikṛtam aṇḍasthānīyāḥ pañca karmayonayo bhavanti- dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā vividiṣā avividiṣeti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5559: pracyuto mahato yastu na prāpto jñānalakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5567: tatra yadāyaṃ jantuḥ śubhāśubheṣu kāryeṣu vṛttyanusārī jijñāsurajijñāsurvā śarīraṃ parityajati tāmeva karmayonimupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5570: vāci karmaṇi saṃkalpe pratijñāṃ yo na rakṣati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5573: dānaṃ parigrahaḥ śaucaṃ śraddhāyāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam //
GSP31yuktdipu:5574: sukhārthī yastu seveta vidyāṃ karma tapāṃsi vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5575: prāyaścittaparo nityaṃ sukhāyāṃ sa tu vartate //
GSP31yuktdipu:5591: yonīnāṃ yo vidyādyativṛṣabhaṃ taṃ tvahaṃ manye //
GSP31yuktdipu:5599: apānaviṣayastvapakramaṇaṃ dharmādiviṣaya evāparoddhavyamevaṃ hyasya khyātiviṣayākārasya tamaso nirhrāsaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5605: atyantāvinābhāvaṃ ca vyānaviṣayaṃ jñānaviṣaya eva bhāvayet /
GSP31yuktdipu:5608: so 'yaṃ dharmādiṣu pravaṇastatpratipakṣāpakrāntaḥ sattvārāmo vinivṛttābhimāno jñānaniṣṭhaḥ saviśuddhayoniracireṇa parama brahmopapadyata iti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5617: āha, yeyamekaikasmin rūpādāvarthe karaṇacatuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ sā kiṃ yugapat āhosvit krameṇeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5618: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet ubhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5623: ato naḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ cakṣurmanovadyugapadasya vṛttiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5627: sa cetsapyagupadekṣyasi ko nirbandhastadeva pratipadyāmahe iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5632: tatra na śakyata etadvaktuṃ sati śaktisadbhāve viṣayasambandhe ca kasyacittatra vṛttiḥ kasyacinneti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5635: yadi hi krameṇa śrotrādīnāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca bāhye 'rthe vṛttiḥ syādapi tarhi meghastanitakṛṣṇasarpālocanādiṣvapyupalabhyate kramaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5638: ucyate- yaduktaṃ śrotrādīnāmantaḥkaraṇasya cābhinnakālaṃ vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5649: tadyathā cakṣustvacoḥ samānadeśatve śaktiviṣayasambandhopapattau rajodhūmātapādigataḥ sparśa evopalabhyate, na rūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5659: tathā ca vṛṣagaṇavīreṇāpyuktaṃ bhavati ___ anāgatavyavahitaviṣayajñānaṃ tu liṅgagāgamābhyām / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5664: tatra duṣṭe kramaḥ prati nāsti sandehaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5665: yatpunaretaduktaṃ dṛṣṭe meghastanitakṛṣṭasarpālocanādau kramānupalabdheryugapaccatuṣṭayasya vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ- etadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5674: tatra yaduktaṃ meghastanitādiṣu kramānanugate yugapaccatuṣṭayasya vṛttirityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5676: tadyathā catuṣṭayasya mano 'haṃkārabuddhīnāmantaḥkaraṇānāṃ bāhyenaikena karaṇena śrotreṇa vā cakṣuṣā vā saha catuṣṭayasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5686: āha, kiṃ punareṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ svaviṣayaniyamena vṛttirbhavati āhosvidvyatikareṇeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5687: ucyate- nanu ca prāgeva rūpādiṣu pañcānāmālocanamātramiṣyate vṛttiriti (ISk 28)
GSP31yuktdipu:5693: iha karaṇāntareṇa cakṣuṣāmradāḍimādirūpopalabdhau satyāṃ karaṇāntarasya jihvālakṣaṇasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiścopalabdhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5699: ucyate- atrāpi nāstīndriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇavyatikaraḥ / kiṃ tarhi
GSP31yuktdipu:5701: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5702: yasya karaṇasya yā vṛttirapadiṣṭā tadyathā śrotrasya śabdagrahaṇam,
GSP31yuktdipu:5709: parasparākūtaṃ pratipatteḥ kāraṇamiti kṛtvā tācchabdyaṃ labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5711: etaduktaṃ bhavati yadā cakṣuṣāmradāḍimādi rūpamupalabdhaṃ bhavati tadā rasanendriyamupāttaviṣayasya cakṣuṣo vṛttiṃ saṃvedya svaviṣayajighṛkṣayautsuktavadvikāramāpadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5712: rasanasya vṛtiṃ saṃvedya pādau viharaṇamārabhete hastāvādānaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5727: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasya paṭoḥ sahacāriṇamarthamindriyāntaraviṣayatāmāpannaṃ saṃspṛśya svabhāvata indriyāntaraṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati sākāṃkṣaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5732: yathā buddheḥ prasādamanantaraṃ bhautikānāmavayavānāṃ mukhanayanādīnāṃ prasādo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5743: yathā kiṃcidindriyaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ bhavati tadā taddvāreṇa samastamarthamupalabhya tatsahacāriṇamarthāntaramākāṃkṣadindriyāntaraṃ vṛttyā pratitiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5745: tathā ca tantrāntare 'pyuktaṃ- “yasya yasyendriyasya viṣayaṃ manodhyāyatyabhisampattyarthena tasya tasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiśca bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5746: ” etaduktaṃ svāṃ svāṃ pratipadyante parasparākūtahetukīṃ vṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5747: kimindriyaṃ manovṛttyādhiṣṭhāya svaviṣaye pravartayati yathā paraśvādīṃścaitra iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5749: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasaṃkalpānugṛhītasya manasaḥ saṃsparśātsvayamevendriyaṃ svaviṣayaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5751: na hi yathā caitrasya paraśvādiprayogaśaktiḥ siddhā evaṃ manasa indriyaprayogaśaktiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5758: indriyāntare 'pi hi tarhi rajo 'stītyata ātmabhūtenaivāsya nimittena pravṛttirapratiṣiddhā,
GSP31yuktdipu:5761: caitro hi paraśvādīnāṃ prayogaṃ karaṇāntareṇa karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5764: tadapi hi caitravyāpārāpekṣaṃ pravartate na svataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5766: yasya hi prayojakāntarāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ na tasya kadācidapi svatantrasya bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5769: na cetkārakaṃ yathā maulānāṃ guṇānāmevamihāpi puruṣārtha evaṃ heturna kena citkāryate karaṇamiti siddham // 31 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:5782: pañca karmendriyāṇi pañca buddhīndriyāṇi mano 'haṅkāro buddhiścetyetatsarvaṃ puruṣārthopayogikaraṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5784: yadi yathā vārṣagaṇā āhuḥ- liṅgamātre mahānasaṃvedyaḥ kāryakāraṇarūpeṇa viśiṣṭāviśiṣṭalakṣaṇena,
GSP31yuktdipu:5787: āha, satyam, pradhānalakṣaṇānāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamyamātrarūpatve 'pi tattvāntaramasau bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5791: evaṃ hi parikalpyamāne pradhānamahatoryadantarālaṃ tadapi ca kriyārūpatvādakriyāvata upākhyāntaramiti tattvāntarānavasthāprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5800: kiṃ ca tatkriyate yadapekṣya buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5801: ucyate- yaduktaṃ kā kriyetyatra brūmaḥ- tannirvartakamihābhipretāt na daṇḍādivat,
GSP31yuktdipu:5834: buddhyādisaṃkhyāṃ hi vyatikramamāṇasya pratipattau nāsti hetuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5837: śrotrasyāntaḥkaraṇatvaprasaṃgādayuktamiti cet syādetat- buddhimahaṃkāraṃ coktvā tata āha buddhīndriyāṇi karṇatvakcakṣūrasananāsikākhyānīti (ISk 26) /
GSP31yuktdipu:5841: ata evedamācāryeṇāpekṣya manaso 'ntaḥkaraṇatvaṃ pṛthaguktam- taccendriyamubhayathā samākhyātam,
GSP31yuktdipu:5848: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhamityukte gamyata etatpariśeṣādeva daśadhā bāhyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5852: akriyamāṇe tvasmin kintat trayasya viṣayākhyamiti na jñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5855: tatra śeṣe vā yathānyāsaṃ vocyamāne na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5858: katham ? daśadhā bāhyaṃ śabdādiviṣayagrahaṇabhūtameva trayasyāpi viṣayākhyaṃ yathā syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:5865: buddhyahaṃkāramanolakṣaṇasya hi trayasyopāttaviṣayā buddhīndriyakarmendriyavṛttayaḥ samparkādviṣayarūpapratyavabhāsanimittatāmupagacchantyo viṣayākhyatāṃ labhante /
GSP31yuktdipu:5867: buddhistu niścayarūpatvātkaraṇāntaranirapekṣā sarvamarthaṃ pravṛttau prati niścayarūpeṇādhyastaṃ puruṣāyopasaṃharati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5868: tatra śabdādisannidhāne vṛttīnāṃ tādrūpyāpattestadapagame ca tādrūpyāpagamāt prāpyakāri /
GSP31yuktdipu:5877: atha coktaṃ kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā viśeṣalakṣaṇamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5878: tatra kena karaṇena kasya viṣayasya grahaṇamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5881: teṣāṃ pūrvoktānāmindriyāṇāṃ yāni buddhīndriyāṇi pañca śrotrādīni tāni viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇi pratipattṛbhedena /
GSP31yuktdipu:5882: tatra devānāṃ yāni indriyāṇi tāni dharmotkarṣādviśuddhānyaviśeṣānapi gṛhṇanti prāgeva viśeṣāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:5889: vāgindriyasya vāyvabhihateṣu vadanapradeśeṣu tālvādiṣu dhvanervarṇapadavākyaślokagranthabhāvena vikārāpādanaṃ sarvaprāṇināmaviśiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5898: sambhāvanārthamapi ca pañcaviṣayāṇyetāni prāgeva tu catustriviṣayāṇīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5909: yatra nāsti kiṃcid bhūtārthena pratyakṣaṃ yadapyekṣyetarat pratyakṣābhāsaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5915: tathā hi gandharvanagarādiṣu kadācittamevārthaṃ gāṃ paśyati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5918: svapne caikamūrtipatitānāṃ gopuruṣāśvarāsabhanadīvṛkṣaprabhṛtīnāṃ darśanaṃ smaraṇe viparyayeṇa dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5920: vicchinnānāṃ cāvayavānāṃ punaḥ sandhānaṃ ākāśagamanamanīśvarasyānimittaṃ rājyalābha iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5928: syādetat- yathā dvayasamāptipūrvakaḥ śukravisargaḥ sa ca tadabhāve 'pi svapne bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5942: iha pratyakṣaṃ balīya ityapratyakṣasya tena pratyākhyānamupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5946: syādetat- yadi paramārthato narakapālāḥ syusteṣāmapi duḥkhasambandhaḥ syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:5964: na cedasanto yuktamupadiṣṭaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi teṣāṃ pañca viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇīti // 34 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5972: āha, karaṇāviśeṣādayuktam antaḥkaraṇasya hīndriyānāṃ ca karaṇatvamaviśiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5977: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31yuktdipu:5980: atra cāntaḥkaraṇagrahaṇenaiva buddhergrahaṇe siddhe bhūyo buddhigrahaṇaṃ prādhānyakhyāpanārtham /
GSP31yuktdipu:5981: bhavati hi pradhānasya sāmānye 'ntarbhūtasyāpi pṛthagupadeśaḥ / tadyathā
GSP31yuktdipu:5982: jagāma taṃ vanoddeśaṃ vyāsaḥ saha maharṣibhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5988: tadyathā prāsādasya pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimānāṃ svadiṅniyamo na pūrvamuttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ paścimaṃ vā kadācidbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5990: tatrāniyatāḥ sarvadigavasthitairdvāraiḥ pravartanta evamihāpi śrotrādīni svaviṣayaniyatāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:5991: sāntaḥkaraṇā tu buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate yasmāt tasmādaniyataviṣayatvādupapannamettrividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri,
GSP31yuktdipu:5997: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6005: guṇaviśeṣā ityanena sattvādīnāṃ puruṣavijñānamuddiśya tadbhāvena pariṇāmaṃ khyāpayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6006: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthamiti viśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ āhāryadhāryaprakāśyatayā yathāsambhavaṃ prakāśya svavṛttyanuguṇaṃ kṛtvā viṣayavyāpāreṇānubhūya buddhāvādhatte,
GSP31yuktdipu:6009: sarvathā tvayaṃ śāstrārtho yena vā tena karaṇena viṣayamupāttaṃ buddhiradhyavasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6010: tayā cādhyavasāyarūpāpannayā cetanāśaktiranugṛhyate na karaṇāntarasya puruṣeṇa samabandho 'sti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6015: āha, kaḥ punaratra heturyena dvāritvāviśeṣe satyahaṃkāramanasī buddhau viṣayādhānaṃ kuruto na punaranayoḥ sākṣātpuruṣeṇa sambandha iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6017: sarva pratyupabhogaṃ yasmāt puruṣasya sādhayati buddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6021: aniścitaviṣayayā ca karaṇavṛttyā puruṣasya samandho 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6025: atastadvṛttyupanipātī viṣayaḥ sannidhānamātrātpuruṣeṇa saṃcetito nāsyaudāsīnyaṃ bādhitumutsahate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6027: etaduktaṃ sarvaṃ pratyupabhogaṃ yasmātpuruṣasya sādhayati buddhiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6036: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi punaḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6037_0: yato yasmātkāraṇāt sā buddhireva hi kāṣṭhāpannena tamasābhibhūtatvāddharmādīnāṃ sattvadharmāṇāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:6038: sa ca mithyājñānābhyāsavāsanānurañjitaṃ buddhipratyayamanurudhyamāno darśitaviṣayatvāttathaiva pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6039: yadā tu dharmādyabhyāsāttamorūpāgame satyuttarottarāṇāṃ sattvadharmāṇamutkarṣastadā vinivṛttamithyāpratyayā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6041: tato viparītāśca guṇā iti śuddhādhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6043: tadetad guṇānāṃ puruṣasya cāntaraṃ dvayorapi niścayasvabhāvatvādasmātpūrvoktadharmabhede 'pi sati sūkṣmaṃ gambhīraṃ durjñeyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6050: tasya ca purastāduddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ- kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā pañca viśeṣā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6052: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmādidameva tāvaducyatāṃ ke viśeṣāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6066: sati viśeṣā udātānudāttasvaritānunāsikādayastatra na santi tasmācchabdatanmātram /
GSP31yuktdipu:6083: tebhyo bhūtānītyetāvati vaktavye pañca pañcabhya iti grahaṇaṃ samasaṃkhyākatastadutpattijñāpanārtham /
GSP31yuktdipu:6085: tataśca yadanyeṣāmācāryāṇāmabhipretam ekalakṣaṇebhyastanmātrebhyaḥ parasparānupraveśādekottarā viśeṣāḥ sṛjyanta iti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6086: kintarhi antareṇāpi tanmātrānupraveśamekottarebhyo bhūtebhya ekottarāṇāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāmutpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6092: atra ca vāyoḥ śītaḥ sparśa apāṃ ca,
GSP31yuktdipu:6095: rūpaṃ ca śuklaṃ bhāsvaraṃ ca tejaso 'pāṃ ca,
GSP31yuktdipu:6103: ākāro gaurāṃ raukṣyaṃ varaṇaṃ sthairyameva ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6107: snehaḥ saukṣmyaṃ prabhā śauklyaṃ mārdavaṃ gauravaṃ ca yat /
GSP31yuktdipu:6109: ūrdhvagaṃ pāvakaṃ dagdhṛ pācakaṃ laghu bhāsvaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:6115: saṃhatānāṃ tu yatkāryaṃ sāmānyaṃ te gavādayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6117: tatrākārādidharmaiḥ pṛthivyā lokasya copakriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6149: tathā tiryakpātādibhirdharmairvāyunā lokasya copakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6159: tathā sarvatogatyādibhirdharmairnabhasā lokasyopakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6170: tadete yathā vyākhyātā aviśeṣā viśeṣāḥ puruṣārthasiddhyarthaṃ bahudhā vyavatiṣṭhante /
GSP31yuktdipu:6178: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtaistridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6179: tatra sūkṣmā nāma ceṣṭāśritaṃ prāṇāṣṭakaṃ saṃsarati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6193: tatsiddhibhyo yathā brahmaṇaḥ putrāṇāṃ tatputraputrāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6203: tatra kecinniyatāḥ kecidaniyatā ityāha- ke punaratra niyatāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6212: mātāpitṛjāśca prabhūtāśca ityato yukta eṣāṃ parigrahaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6215: ucyate- pūrvasarge prakṛterupapannānāṃ prāṇināṃ sattvadharmotkarṣādantareṇa dvayasamāpattiṃ manasaivāpatyamanyadvā yathepsitaṃ prādurbabhūva /
GSP31yuktdipu:6216: priyaṃ khalvapi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣya kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6223: tadetadadyāpyanuvartate- yatpriyaṃ cirādālokya pāṇau saṃspṛśya prītirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6228: strīpuṃsau saṃdhṛṣyāpatyamutpādayetāṃ mamedaṃ mamedamiti ca parigrahāḥ pravṛttāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6231: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvadvaivartaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛsaṃsargakāle karaṇāviṣṭaṃ śukraśoṇitamanupraviśati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6233: vyūḍhāvayavaṃ tūpalabdhapratyayaṃ māturudarānnissṛtya yau dharmādharmau ṣaṭsiddhyupabhogakāle kṛtau tadvaśādavatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6235: yadi dharmasaṃskṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ tato dyudeśaṃ sūkṣmaśarīreṇa prāpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6238: evamātivāhikaṃ sūkṣmaśarīramindriyāṇāṃ dhāraṇaprāpaṇasamarthaṃ nityaṃ bāhyenāpāyinā pariveṣṭyate parityajyate ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6239: patañjalestu sūkṣmaśarīraṃ yatsiddhikāle pūrvamindriyāṇi bījadeśaṃ nayati tatra tatkṛtāśayavaśāt dyudeśaṃ yātanāsthānaṃ vā karaṇāni vā prāpayya nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6240: tatra caivaṃ yuktāśayasya karmavaśādanyadutpadyate yadindriyāṇi bījadeśaṃ nayati tadapi nivartate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6253: tat sūkṣmāsteṣāṃ niyatā iti vacanādasmābhirnābhyupagamyate / tasmāt
GSP31yuktdipu:6263: mahadādītyanena prāṇāṣṭakaṃ parigṛhṇāti pūrvātmānaḥ prāṇādyāśca pañca vāyava iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6273: dyutiryakpreteṣu saṃsaratīti tenaiva cārthasiddhau śarīrāntaraparikalpanānarthakyamato na bahūni śarīrāṇi // 40 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:6277: yatpunaretaduktam- vibhutvādindriyāṇāṃ svātmanyavasthānaṃ vṛttilābho vṛttinirodhaśca saṃsāra iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:6293: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā cchāyā /

GSP31yuktdipu:6296: sthāṇupuruṣādibhyo vā vinā cchāyāyāḥ tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6309: atha matamagṛhyamāṇena sambandhāt sthūlasyāpi śarīrasyāgrahaṇaṃ pretāñjanasiddhamālyādivat /
GSP31yuktdipu:6328: kṛtsnasyāśayasya pariṇāmaṃ jānannevamupālabhyaḥ syādekadeśastu no vipariṇāmī /
GSP31yuktdipu:6345: tatra kṛtābhyāṃ hi bījāveśaḥ karaṇasya niṣpādito yāvatkalalādyasthāyāmeva taccharīraṃ vinaṣṭamiti tatra kṛtāśayasyāsambhavāccharīrāntarānupapattiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6347: āśayasya sthāvaraśarīrārambhe caritārthatvātsthāvaraśarīreṇa cāśayopādānasambhavāttasya saṃsārābhāvaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6353: āha, yadi puruṣārthā liṅgasyotpattirabhyupagamyate tatsamanantaramevānena puruṣārtho 'vasāyayitavyo na punardevamānuṣatiryagbhāvena punaḥ punarājañjavībhāvo 'nuṣṭhātavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6358: tathāpi sattvarajastamasāṃ trayāṇāmapi prādhānyādrajastamobhyāmabhibhūte sattve tatpreritaṃ nimittanaimittikaśarīrendriyaviṣayopabhoganirvartakaṃ śṛṇoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6361: tatra phalecchayā yonīḥ prāṇādīṃśca sammukhīkṛtya kriyāmārabhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6363: tataśca prakṛtervibhutvayogāttena tena nimittenopasthāpitaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakpretādiśarīramekasvabhāvamapi sannaṭavadvyavatiṣṭhate liṅgamākṛtiviśeṣopādānatyāgasāmyataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6376: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvaddvividhaṃ jñānaṃ prākṛtikaṃ vaikṛtikaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6378: tatra tattvasamakālaṃ saṃhataśca mahāṃstattvātmanā mahati pratyayo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6383: vaikṛtaṃ tu dvividhaṃ svavaikṛtaṃ paravaikṛtaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6389: vaikṛtamapi ca dvividhaṃ svavaikṛtaṃ tatra tārakaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6394: tatra paramarṣerapi sargasaṃghātavyūhottarakālameva jñānaṃ niṣpadyate yasmād gurumukhābhipratipatteḥ pratipatsyata ityapītyāha- siddhaṃ nimittaṃ naimittikasyānugrahaṃ kurute,
GSP31yuktdipu:6397: tatra paramarṣeḥ paṭurūhaḥ anyeṣāṃ kliṣṭa ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6398: sarveṣāmeva tu tārakādyaviśiṣṭamācārya āha- trividhā bhāvāḥ sāṃsiddhikāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtikāśceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6401: katham ? yadi hi tathā syāttattvāntarānutpattisaṃghāto vyūhaścānarthakaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6407: tasmādasya sahaiva kāryakāraṇābhyāṃ jñānamabhiniṣpadyate pradīpaprakāśādityataḥ sāṃsiddhikam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6408: anyeṣāṃ tu sattvasyāpaṭutvātkālāntareṇa prakṛtyabhiṣyandād drāgiti bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6421: tasyāmapahatāyāṃ prakṛteḥ śuddhisrotaḥ pravṛttaṃ yenānugṛhīto duḥkhatrayābhighātādutpannajijñāsaḥ pravrajitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6425: evaṃ trividhabhāvaparigrahāttvācāryasya na sarvaṃ svataḥ patañjalivat,
GSP31yuktdipu:6427: / kintarhi mahatī svabhāvātivṛttiḥ prakṛtito 'lpā svato vikṛtitaḥ / evam
GSP31yuktdipu:6438: prākṛtaṃ yathāmāhātmyaṃ śarīrābhimānāt tasya hyabhimāno bhavati- hantāhaṃ putrānsrakṣye ye me karma kariṣyanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6443: yathā bhiṣagvede 'bhihitam- kṣīraṃ pītvā garbhiṇī gauraṃ putraṃ janayatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6449: āha, kasya punarbhāvasyānuṣṭhānātko gamanaviśeṣo liṅgasya niṣpadyata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6459: yadi bhāvānāṃ bhūmiviśeṣanimittatvaṃ niyamyate tenaikasyāṃ bhūmau hīnamadhyamotkṛṣṭatvaṃ jātyākṛtisvabhāvānugrahopaghātānāṃ na prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6462: dharmeṇa deveṣu mānaveṣu tiryakṣu cordhvagamanamutkṛṣṭaṃ janma bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6468: yaduktamanyairācāryaiḥ- vairāgyātpuruṣakaivalyaṃ jñānavairāgyābhyāṃ ceti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6469: āha, yadi punarvairāgyātpuruṣakaivalyamabhyupagamyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6472: yadi rāganimittaḥ pradhānapuruṣasaṃyogaḥ syāt prāptamidaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa vairāgyeṇa viyogo bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6486: tasmād bandhastrividho bhavati prakṛtibandho dakṣiṇābandho vaikārikabandhaśceti // 44 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:6495: āha, yadi vairāgyātprakṛtilayaḥ prāpto yadetatprakṛtau vairāgyamāñjasam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6505: tadviparītaḥ cetanaḥ svatantraśceti tato 'pi prakṛtau layaḥ tataścānirmokṣaprasaṃga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6508: tataśca viparītaṃ yadeva vairāgyaṃ tuṣṭikāṇḍānupatitaṃ prakṛtyādiṣu paratvābhimānaḥ tata eva prakṛtilayo bhavati nānyasmāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6509: athavātrāpi yattatprakṛtāvanyatvajñānaṃ tata eva mokṣo na vairāgyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6525: dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayābhilāṣadvāreṇa tannirvartake karmaṇi pravartamāno guṇavṛttivaicitryādaniṣṭaphalanirvartakamapi karma karoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6526: evaṃ mānuṣye gatyantare yopapattiḥ sarvāsau rāgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6532: viṣaye yo rāgaḥ sa saṃsāraheturityasyārthasya jñāpanārthamidamucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6533: anyathā yo yateḥ sāttviko yamaniyamadhyānādyanuṣṭhānānurāgaḥ pravacanarāgo vā so 'pi saṃsārāya syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6535: yadaṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryamaṇimādi prāgupadiṣṭaṃ tasmātsve sve viṣaye 'vighāta utpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6537: āha, yadi tribhistribhirnimittairvairāgyādibhistrividho bandho nirvartyate yaduktamajñānād bandha iti tadayuktam /

GSP31yuktdipu:6561: pratyayasarga iti pratyayaḥ padārtho lakṣaṇamiti paryāyāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6562: pratyayānāṃ sargaḥ pratyayasargaḥ padārthasargo lakṣaṇasarga ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6564: tasya sargo 'yamataḥ pratyayasargaḥ pratyayakāryaṃ pratyayavyāpāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6567: katham ? evaṃ hi śāstram- “mahadādiviśeṣāntaḥ sargo buddhipūrvakatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6568: utpannakāryakaraṇastu māhātmyaśarīra ekākinamātmānamavekṣyābhidadhyau hantāhaṃ putrānsrakṣye ye me karma kariṣyanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6569: ye māṃ paraṃ cāparaṃ ca jñāsyanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6583: tadyathā dharmārthapravṛtto 'gniṣṭomādīnparityajya saṃkaraṃ kurvīta so 'sya viparyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6601: tatrāśreyasi pravṛttasya pratyayāvare śreyo 'bhimāne ādyo viparyayastama ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6602: bhautikeṣvākāreṣu śiraḥpāṇyādiṣvātmagraho yo 'yaṃ vyūḍhoraskaḥ sitadaśanastāmrākṣaḥ pralambabāhuḥ so 'hamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6603_1: karaṇavṛttiṣvahaṃ śrotā draṣṭā cetyevamādirādyakālapravṛtto grahaḥ sarvasmādavaro moha ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6604: kathaṃ punarayamavaraḥ ityucyate pūrvaṃ śarīrendriyavyatiriktamupalabdhumicchansaukṣmyāttattadanadhigame bhūtākāramabhūtaṃ pramāṇaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ vānumanyeta,
GSP31yuktdipu:6605: svayaṃ vā parikalpayediti na mārgād dūrāpagatametat /

GSP31yuktdipu:6614: yadāsya bāhyadravyaviyoge kaścitkuśalasaṃsṛṣṭa evaṃ bravīti saṃsārasya ___ buddhāvavasthāpya vimṛśyatāṃ yāvadayaṃ kālo yadi kaścitpriyeṇāviyuktapūrvaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6615: tasmādāgamāpāyiṣu bāhyeṣu dravyeṣu viduṣā nābhiniveśaḥ kārya iti,

GSP31yuktdipu:6621: kathaṃ punarayaṃ pūrvasmādavara ityucyate- pūrvo 'bhiniveśātpratiṣidhyamānaḥ pratīkāramantato
GSP31yuktdipu:6624: na tu brahmādau stambaparyante saṃsāre svanimittaniyatatamapātasya vināśasya kenacitpratīkāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6634: evaṃ caturvidhasya pratyayasargasya guṇavaiṣamyavimardena pañcāśadbhedā bhavanti // 47 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:6641: ya ete pañca viparyayabhedā vyākhyātāḥ teṣu tamaso 'ṣṭavidho bhedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6651: aṣṭavidhe kāryakaraṇasāmarthye daśavidhe ca kuṭumbe viṣayeṣu vā yaḥ pratihanyamānasyāveśaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6656: evamete pañca viparyayabhedāḥ svalakṣaṇato viṣayaviśeṣā lakṣitāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6657: tatrāpi cāṣṭāsu prakṛtiṣu sattvarajastamasāṃ saṃhataviviktapariṇatavyastasamastānāṃ paratvābhimānabhedādekaikā prakṛtiḥ pañcadaśabhedā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6658: ata eva te 'ṣṭau pañcadaśa viṃśaṃ śataṃ ca bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6708: śāstre tu bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ prāptiṣvapagameṣu vācāvyavasthyalakṣaṇā upāyanavatvānnava tuṣṭayo bhavanti // 49 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:6715: ādhyātmikī iti śarīraśarīriṇorviśeṣamupalipsamānena yoginā yadanātmanyātmabuddhiravasthāpyate sā khalvādhyātmikī siddhiḥ tuṣṭiḥ santoṣaḥ kṣema ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6717_0: yadā vītāvītaiḥ pradhānamadhigamya tatpūrvakatvaṃ ca mahadādīnāṃ vikārāṇāmānantyācca
GSP31yuktdipu:6719: kasmāt ? amitaṃ hi pradhānatattvaṃ bhāti jagadbījabhūtatvānmahadādibhāvapariṇāmena nyūnasyaikadeśasyātmana evāpūrāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6722: tathā ca śāstramāha- ambha iti guṇaliṅgasannicayamevādhikurute /
GSP31yuktdipu:6724: liṅgaṃ ca mahadādi atra sannihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6726: sa khalvayaṃ yogī pradhānalakṣaṇāṃ bhūmimavajitya tanmahimnā ca tadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyatiriktasya padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6727: bhinne ca dehe prakṛtau layaṃ gacchati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6729: tasyāṃ ca tuṣṭāvanye sapta mahadādikāraṇino 'varuddhā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6730: tatra yathā prādhānikasya puruṣe nāsti vijñānaṃ evamitareṣāmuttareṣu tattveṣu /
GSP31yuktdipu:6740: tamaḥpradhānapuruṣopadeśe sati pratyayanirdidhārayiṣayā tayoḥ pradhānameva jyāyo na puruṣa ityabhiniviśeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:6741: tuṣṭistu kiṃ paramityāśritya pravṛttaḥ pradhānajñānamātre santoṣātpadārthāntaraṃ vijñātumeva nādriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6749: tasmānna padārthasaṃkara iti vyākhyātā prakṛtyākhyā tuṣṭiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6750: yadā tu satyapi prakṛtisāmarthye nānapekṣya yathāsvamupādānaṃ bhāvānāmutpattiḥ sambhavati prakṛtyaviśeṣe sarvakālamutpattiprasaṃgāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:6758: upādānaikadeśa eva ca kāryakāraṇavidhātmā bhoktetyetasmād darśanātsaṅgadveṣanivṛttiṃ labhate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6762: tathā ca kṛtvā śāsramāha “salilaṃ salilamiti vaikārikopanipātamevādhikurute,
GSP31yuktdipu:6764: sa khalvayaṃ yogī pārthivānavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6767: yadā ca satyupādānasāmarthye na tāvataiva bhāvānāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ kiṃ tarhi sannihitasādhanānāmapi kālaṃ pratyapekṣā bhavati- kālaviśeṣādbījādaṅkuro jāyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6781: tadyathā salilaughastṛṇaṃ kāṣṭhamaśmānaṃ prāṇinaṃ vā svamūrtisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ sarvamevābhyāvahati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6787: tathā bījānmūlaṃ mūlādaṅkuramiti vahati / tathā cāha
GSP31yuktdipu:6788: yāmeva prathamāṃ rātriṃ garbhe bhavati pūruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6791: sa khalvayaṃ yogī kālamavajitya padārthāntarābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6794: yadā tu satyapi kālasāmarthye bhāvānāmutpattiḥ bhāgyānapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6796: satyapi sādhanasāmarthye kālaviśeṣe ca kasyacidutpattirbhavati kasyacinneti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6809: yathā hi śīrṇānāmapi tṛṇalatādīnāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya punarāpyāyanaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6814: ” sa khalvayaṃ yogī bhāgyānyavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6819: prakṛtyātmakasya tāvadyogino 'ṣṭau prakṛtayo viṣaya ityuktaṃ purastāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6838: mahataśca rūpaṃ dharmādikaṃ mahato 'rthāntaraṃ bhāgyamiti bhāgyavān /
GSP31yuktdipu:6839: athavā bāhya evāyaṃ kālaḥ karmakāraṇaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6840: tatra cānye 'pi svamatiparikalpitapadārthāntarātmabhāvagrahā eveti sāṅkhyāḥ pravādinaḥ pratikṣiptā boddhavyā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6841: apara āha, prakṛticaitanikaḥ pradhānabhāvāśādyupādānakālabhāgyavādino mahadahaṅkāratanmātravādina iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6843: na hi mahadahaṅkāratanmātralakṣaṇāḥ prakṛtaya upādānakālabhāgyabhāvena prasiddhāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6846: bāhyā viṣayoparamāt pañca ca nava tuṣṭayo 'bhihitāḥ // ISk_50 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6849: tatra yadārjanadoṣamavagacchati na tāvatsarvasyābhijātirastīti arthināvaśyaṃ viṣayārjane vartitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6852: svābhāvikamavasthānaṃ viṣayāṇāmaparikalpyāpi yadā pratigrahādibhirarjanaṃ pratyādriyate tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6854: evamapi nāsti kaścidapratyanīka viṣayopārjanāya iti tadvighāte 'vaśyaṃ prayatitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6855: sa ca yadi pratiyatamānaḥ pratyanīkivighātaṃ kuryātparopaghātenātmānugrahānuṣṭhānācchāstravirodhaḥ / yasmādāha-
GSP31yuktdipu:6867: sukhārthaṃ ca pravṛttasya bhūyiṣṭhaṃ duḥkhamevetyetasmāddarśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6871: yadā tu yogī pūrvadoṣādhigame 'bhijātyā vā yatnārjitaviṣayatve sati rakṣādoṣamupanyasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6874: tasyāṃ ca pravartamāno yadi paramuparundhyāt tadā pūrvoktadoṣaḥ,

GSP31yuktdipu:7493: kathaṃ cāsya samyaksiddhāntavijñānasyāpyanekagranthaśatasahasrākhyeyaṃ sāṃkhyapadārthaṃ satattvamakhaṇḍamācāryāṇāṃ saptatyā saṃkṣiptavān // 71 // @#-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:7500_3: paramarṣyādiyathoktāgamena pramāṇatrayaṃ puraskṛtya tarkadṛśā vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7507: sphuṭābhidheyā madhurāpi bhāratī manīṣiṇo nopakhalaṃ virājate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7509: nayanti santaśca yataḥ svaśaktito guṇaṃ pareṣāṃ tanumapyudāratām /
GSP31yuktdipu:7510: iti prayātveṣa mama śramaḥ satāṃ vicāraṇānugrahamātrapātratām //
GSP31yuktdipu:7511: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau caturthaṃ prakaraṇamekādaśaṃ cāhnikaṃ sampūrṇam //
